title: HappiMe for Young People
description:
HappiMe is an exciting and innovative app for Young People and Teenagers app, designed to help you to:
•	Worry less
•	Be less anxious
•	Be more confident
•	Improve your self-esteem
•	Be happier

There is also a version of this app for children and adults!

Key features:
•	Step One – LEARN 

An engaging video that explains the way the brain works using “The Chimp and The HappiTars”. Your chimp is the part of your brain that worries and tells you that you can’t do stuff! Your HappiTar - your Happiness Avatar - is the part of your brain that cheers you on and tells you that you CAN do it! The app teaches you how to recognise who is in control, and how to tell your chimp brain to… “Back off!”

•	Step Two – RECOGNISE 

The fun swipe game teaches you the difference between a helpful thought and an unhelpful one! This is where you start to recognise your unhelpful self-talk.

•	Step three – DEAL WITH YOUR EMOTIONS 
The Mini-Mindful Bites section contains relaxation audios and videos on mindfulness, meditation, visualisation and HappiTapping to help you to understand - and deal with - your emotions and feelings.

•	Step four – REPLACE 

The playlist feature is where you start replacing your thoughts with more helpful ways of thinking. You can create multiple playlists of helpful thoughts from hundreds of pre-recorded audios. Choose from audios to increase confidence, reduce anxiety, improve health, deal with friendship issues, develop self-belief and boost self-esteem. You can even record your own helpful thoughts if you want to! Then simply choose a backing track (or upload your own), hit 'continuously play' and listen as often as you can to start changing the way you think!
 
The app uses the following proven tools and techniques in a fun and engaging way, to introduce you to the power of helpful thoughts and thinking positively: 
•	CBT (Cognitive Behavioural Therapy)
•	NLP (Neuro Linguistic Programming) 
•	HappiTapping (EFT - Emotional Freedom Technique) 
•	Mindfulness  
•	Positive Psychology 
•	Visualisation (Positive Mental Rehearsal)
 
Join the HappiMe 30-Day Challenge to win prizes! Each time you use the app you build points... And points mean prizes! Check out the '30-Day Challenge' link on the app. 

There is a children’s, teenager’s and adult’s version of this app. The apps for children and teenagers are completely free. The profit from the adult app will help pay for the free version for children and will ensure those apps remain free forever! We have managed to keep the cost of the adult version so low by creating an exact duplicate of the children’s version – with different audios, videos and playlists of course! 
HappiMe is a Community Interest Company – all profits from the adult version of the app are re-invested to spread the HappiMe message! 

IMPORTANT!
HappiMe contains 100’s of audios files, so it’s a big ole app. It may be best to download it when you are using Wi-Fi! 
Also, to keep the app size as small as we can, we have hosted the videos on YouTube, so you will need an internet connection to view them.
Don't forget to enable push notifications so we can keep you motivated! 
And lastly, you can create multiple users per app if you would like to share the apps with your family members .

Good luck!

title: Free Books – Novels, Fiction Books, & Audiobooks
description:
Free Books app is a place to discover the best FREE good reads with fresh, modern app interface and design. Here you can read unlimited ebooks in our ebook reader. We have a huge collection of classic literature including the most well-known romantic novels, fairy tales, epic books and fantasy books from classic novelists. There are also young adult and science fiction titles that inspire today’s dystopia genre. There is also a banned books section! You can also find audiobooks within our app so you can enjoy the classic literature audibly while you are doing something else or you are too tired to read. 

What do you consider good reads? Science fiction? Young Adults?  Epic books that will immerse you in the stories? Romance novels that will move your heart? You can find them here on Free Books, an ebook reader app loaded with thousands of classic literature titles that you can read for free. These fiction books by the classic novelists are as thrilling as modern genre such as dystopia. You can even read banned books - books that are used to be banned or still banned in some countries. Now they are legally free to access by everyone and so we compile them in a FREE ebook reader so you can enjoy them anytime you want. Furthermore, we have the audiobooks section where you can enjoy these titles audibly too. 

=== WHY CHOOSE FREE BOOKS: ===

●	Read for FREE and enjoy it anytime and anywhere. 
●	Huge Collection: We have over 50,000 ebooks to read from authors all around the world. We have all the timeless literature, epic books, fantasy books, thriller books, classic fairy tales, mystery, and romance novels from classic novelists.
●	Featured Content: Enjoy fresh content and reading recommendation. We work hard to make sure our users can enjoy something that suits their reading preference and taste. 
●	Audiobooks: Unlike the other ebook readers, we have audiobooks section so you can listen to the stories instead of reading them. Or you can read and listen at the same time, which is a great exercise for people who are learning English! 
●	Fresh App Design: We’ve just created a new design for you! It looks fresh, clean, and very user friendly. There are also new features and new books added to make reading a lot more comfortable.

FEATURES OF MY BOOKS:
-	Get a recommended read from us! 
-	Read the gems of Ancient literature
-	Read Quotes of the day by classic novelists and authors
-	Enjoy books audibly by listening to our popular Audiobooks
-	Browse by choosing Authors, Categories
-	Use Search function to look for specific title or author
-	Save books to My Library

CATEGORIES:
●	Best & Most Popular Novels of All Time. 
●	Adventure
●	Autobiographies & Biographies
●	Banned Books
●	Drama
●	English 101
●	Epic Books
●	Fantasy Books
●	History
●	Horror Stories
●	Mystery
●	Myth and Legends
●	Philosophy
●	Poetry
●	Politic
●	Romance Novels
●	Science Fiction
●	Theology
●	Thriller Books
●	Travel
●	US Presidents
●	War
●	Western stories
●	Young Adult

Free Books is simply the best place to find good reads. Download it now!

---

Free Books is free to use. Therefore your support is highly needed to maintain and improve our app and content. Please take just one minute to leave great feedback to us by writing a review and rate our app. Help other people discover our app by sharing our ebook reader to your friends and family.

title: gohenry - the allowance app for young people
description:
gohenry helps teach young people between the ages of 6 and 18 to spend, manage and save money. 

gohenry offers users a website, mobile app and debit card parents can control. Parents set rules and limits, can set up automatic allowances or tasks and chores for their children to earn extra. It’s an easy way for parents to manage money, teach young people financial responsibility and provide them independence so they can learn with no danger of debt. 

The gohenry Android app makes it even easier and more convenient for parents and their kids to manage their gohenry accounts. 

Young People you can:
- Customize your card to make gohenry unique to you
- Use Saving Goals to automatically save towards the things you want and need
- Track all your spending in easy to understand, visual formats, with your spend broken down by retailer, channel (e.g. online vs offline), size and more
- Check your balance and recent transactions in real time and always know how much you have available to spend
- Receive instant, real time notifications on all spending and payments from your parents
- Manage all your tasks to earn extra allowance
- Easily pay your parents back by transferring money to their parent account 
- Check your limits 
- Block your gohenry card if you lose it
- Refer friends and earn extra money

Parents you can:
- Set weekly allowance payments, make one-off money transfers, send money instantly and set tasks so that your kids can earn extra 
- Set your children’s spending rules and limits 
- Receive instant, real time notifications when your children spend using their card, telling you where and how much
- View recent transactions in real time and monitor your children’s savings goals 
- Top up your own parent account from within the app
- Block the gohenry card if you lose it
- Manage your gohenry profile from within the app including setting up auto-funding and more
- Retrieve your children’s card PIN and manage your passwords 
- Refer friends to earn extra money

Our new custom cards mean you can make your child’s card as unique as they are. Add their name, choose a pattern and pick a color to make learning about money something children can be proud of. 

At gohenry we believe in empowering kids to learn, save money and build confidence with managing a budget. We also believe in the traditional money values of earning and spending responsibly. 

The gohenry app helps parents and children manage their accounts on the move. If you don’t already have a gohenry account and would like to join, or just want to know more, visit us at www.gohenry.co You can open an account online within minutes and get started for free.

© gohenry Inc. The gohenry card is issued by Community Federal Savings Bank, member FDIC, pursuant to license by MasterCard International.

https://www.gohenry.co/website-and-app-terms/

recentChanges:
Hey there!

It's now *FREE* to make payments with your gohenry card abroad! We've introduced a new screen to tell you exactly how it works, and you'll see the currency conversion rate for peace of mind.

We've also been working hard improving the gohenry app for kids, both young and old. We've got some new themes for kids and teens and made a few adjustments in the parent app to make things easier to find.
comments: I love this card it is brilliant. I can see when and where time and this card is used. Set credit limits turn on and off. I can tell when my child last seen. You can encourage your children or child to do more throws. My child is happy to do his throws because he's get paid. I will recommend this card.

This app has been perfect for my daughter. It's so helpful that you can limit spending and limit where they can spend their money. I absolutely love the task facility, my child has special needs so the fact that I can make appropriate, simplified tasks for her to achieve is just brilliant, and rewarding for both of us.

It's good, but feels a bit steep, top up fee is same for topping up £20 or £25... Not had long enough to see if it's different for bigger amounts. Notifications are hit and miss too, sometimes coming a while after the event, reminder to tick off tasks sometimes happens, sometimes late, sometimes not at all. It's great for my kids to learn about money management, but there are some bugs

Dissapointing I love the concept, then I went to activate card and load it. Its $4.99 to add $10 on top of a monthly fee thats more then i pay for my own card. Then i get to the payment page and you cant use prepaid cards like Netspend, Western Union etc. You have to have a brick and mortar bank account which is a little hypocritical considering this is a prepaid card. I was excited to use this with my son unfortunatley we wont be. Thankfully there is other options.

The app is brilliant for controlling spending, it can be linked to ps4 so stops my children spending on my card. I had a problem today due to my child giving their bank details to someone (his fault) and Go Henry staff handled it so well and so efficiently, I couldn't fault them at all. The app alerted me to someone trying to spend all the money in the account so I knew there was something wrong and managed to block the card and change the password with in minutes. ☆☆☆☆☆

title: Sparkle - Meet New People, Make Friends Dating App
description:
Sparkle is an popular online social, chatting and dating app. and you can match, chat, meet new people and make friends here. The most and important feature in Sparkle is to increase the probability of chat, match and meet success from reading users’ chat history. 

Do you want to meet new people, find a new friendship, and keep away from loneliness? Do you want to go out of inner circle? Do you want to peek into others' inner world? In Sparkle, our system can find users who match with you by checking his/her reply rate, attractiveness, hobbies and other related information. Therefore, every information in Sparkle could make you much easier learn about one's real self and soul. Hope you have a wonderful journey and find the best match here. 

More Features
- Sparkle would recommend plenty of people who share the same hobbies, location and other related information with you on "Matches". "Follow" is no longer need to do before you chat. Now, it's the time for you to chat with the user who you liked.

title: Learning For Young People
description:
This is a simple app for you or your young people that let's you/him/her to learn many things in an interesting and fun way.

1. Your young person can learn how to draw with a simple yet powerful drawing palette. You can even take a photo and than draw on it. All content can be shared on your preferable social media platform with a unique text (the default text is "my sunshine draw this :)")
2. When clicked on a bear icon your child can learn the different sounds different animals make
3. Once clicked on a talking boy icon your child can record a voice from nature and listen to it therefore learn the cognitive process of listening different sounds from nature
4. When you click on the Youtube icon the app automaticly redirects you to the 90's kids cartoon channel in order to easily entartain your kid.

title: Pesky gNATs
description:
*Be advised that a password is required to access this app. Passwords are provided by Pesky gNATs clinicians*

Pesky gNATs is an App for young people to use as they complete the Pesky gNATs Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) intervention with a mental health professional. A central part of CBT is completing tasks between meetings with a therapist. This helps a young person consolidate their understanding of the CBT model and practice new skills learnt during the intervention. Completing between session tasks is often difficult for both adults and children so we think having an interesting, convenient and fun way to do them will help.

During the Pesky gNATs CBT intervention young people meet regularly with a therapist. Together with their therapist they play the Pesky gNATs desktop game. In the game they visit a 3-D world called “gNAT’s Island” and meet a team of wildlife explorers. In each session a member of this team introduces them to one of seven CBT concepts that unfold during the course of the game. Little creatures called gNATs are used to provide a concrete representation of Negative Automatic Thoughts a key – but typically abstract – concept in CBT. Through the game and with the support of a qualified therapist, the young person learns to apply these CBT concepts to their current difficulties. 

Young people use the Pesky gNATs app between meetings with their therapist. The app supports the young person’s application of the CBT ideas they learn in session to their everyday life at home, at school and in their community. The App has weekly CBT tasks, Mindfulness skills, a gNAT gallery, and 3 fun games that unlock when the young person completes the between session tasks! 

The App has 5 sections: 
 
1. gNAT Adventures between session CBT tasks: 1. Record a positive and negative Thought Feeling Behaviour Relationship. 2 Trap some gNATs 3. Trap some gNATs 4. Swat your gNATs. 5. Hive hunt 6. Splat a Hive 7. Relapse Prevention. 
2. Games - 3 fun games (Man Eating Sheep; Whack a gNAT; Hive Hunt) that unlock only if you complete between session tasks and reinforce ideas from the relevant CBT task.  
3. Chill Out Zone includes six mindfulness exercises, one relaxation exercise and one activity scheduling task.
4. The Achievements section allows young people to earn badges for completing tasks.
5. The gNAT gallery contains an illustrated reminder of the 11 different types of negative automatic thinking in the Pesky gNATs game.

title: iamme
description: The i am me app is a positive mental health app focused on supporting young people from secondary school age and beyond to be able to cope and understand how they can be proactive in looking after their own mental health and well-being. The app has been created for young people by young people and covers a vast range of topics relevant to the challenges that young people face growing up in today’s technological and social media driven world. Through positive psychology the app takes each young user on a journey of self-exploration discovering more about themselves and understanding what they need to do to have better balance in today’s fast paced world. The app is not only a knowledge sharing platform but is interactive, incorporates videos and audio and enables each young user to track how they feeling, monitoring their own levels of happiness, gratitude, stress and headspace amongst many other things. Each content area is educational and broadens the user’s knowledge on the given subject and also provides top tips of different things that they can incorporate into their daily lives to make simple changes towards creating more positive mental health.  The i am me app is about empowering young people to regain control and a time when things may feel out of control. It is about positioning mental health as something that is as important as physical health so that it becomes second nature for each young user to support their own mental health and well-being with an overall aim of reducing the statistics surrounding mental health in young people.

title: Young Times​
description:
Young Times, a Khaleej Times brand with 22 years of legacy, has always been the last word for the YOUTH. In 2018, we've brought back the magazine with a digital twist. We aspire to emerge as the one-stop destination for the young adults of the region. We will cater to their every need, every hope, every desire, and partner with them as they aspire to fulfill their dreams. Easily the best in terms of content, design and reach, it shall once again edge out its competitors to dominate the youth scene. From 'Celebrating the Spirit of Youth' to 'Empowering Youth' — we invite you to be part of this journey. It will be a journey of togetherness with the youth adults of today. Extraordinary youngsters in the UAE will be featured. We'll give you the scoop on what is in and what is out — the latest that is available in the market, gadgets, games, apps, and much more. Whether it's table manners, cooking and etiquette, the wildlife and the environment, volunteering for young adults to give back to society, current affairs and school news, fashion, contests or events in the city —  Young Times  is your one-stop destination for it all.
With well-researched and crisp content along with a trendy design, Young Times will appeal to the 9 to 14-year-olds, who are, in fact, the decision makers in every house. Pester power or rather pester ‘empower’ cannot be ignored, and we offer you the best platform to reach this group. The magazine will serve as a forum for youngsters to showcase their talents, be it in writing, quizzing, art and craft — whatever they would deem fit. The aim of the magazine is to develop a generation of wholesome youngsters.

title: SAUTIplus
description:
SAUTIplus is specially designed to help young people access accurate and reliable  information about sexual and reproductive health & Rights in a convenient manner. 

It provides a safe space where young people can ask and have questions about their sexual and reproductive health answered.  It seeks to help young people understand and safely exercise their Reproductive Health Rights.

This app features information ranging from different topics tailored for young people. It features stories on; Growing up, HIV/AIDS awareness and prevention, girltalk, boytalk, drugs, STIs, Abstinence, menstruation, cross generational sex, living positive, contraceptives, among several other reproductive health topics. It employs a youthful language, colour and themes to make it contemporary to the young audience and a dependable reference point for them regarding SRHR issues.

Targeted to young people, SAUTIplus reduces the stigma associated with young people and sexual and reproductive focused health visits. The App allows them to discover Youth friendly health centers to go to for stigma free SRHR services.

title: NYAS Advocacy App
description:
NYAS stands for the National Youth Advocacy Service. NYAS is the leading national provider of advocacy for children and young people. We also provide advocacy services for children and young people in Wales. We provide lots of services and some services for adults. Our main service though is advocacy for children and young people. NYAS is a rights based charity. 

If you are a care leaver, in care, have been told that there is to be  a child protection conference about you, if you are disabled, then you have the right to an advocate. You may be entitled to an advocate for another reason. We also provide mental health advocates if you are unwell and in hospital. 

An independent advocate will help you to be heard when important decisions are being made about your life. An advocate will go to meetings with you if that is what you want. They will help you to talk about your wishes and feelings. If you find meetings difficult they will support you. Sometimes they will go to meetings for you if that is what you want. An advocate will help you to start, change or stop something in your life. They will also talk to you about your rights and entitlements so that you can make the right choices and decisions about your life.

The free NYAS advocacy app gives you direct contact with the NYAS helpline if you need an advocate. It also contains useful information about what your rights are if you are in care (including mental health settings), if you are a care leaver or if there are child protection issues about you. It is a quick reference for professionals too about advocacy and the services NYAS provides.

Key features:

•	Remote access to NYAS helpline wherever you are – this means that if you have a mobile phone you can contact the helpline by phone, email or Skype. You don’t need  Wi-Fi to use the app. If you email us and want us to call you back, we will do this. Our helpline is open 9 a.m. - 8 p.m. Mondays – Fridays and 10 a.m. – 4 p.m. on Saturdays.

•	Information for young people about getting involved with NYAS – At NYAS we have a Participation Team who provide opportunities for young people in care and care leavers to be involved in the charity and to develop their skills. For example we have trained young people as peer advocates so that they can then go on to be professional advocates. This gives them something to put on job application forms too. More information can be found on the NYAS Young person’s website at http://youngpeople.nyas.net

•	Information about NYAS Legal Services – The legal team at NYAS support children and young people when their parents are in court because they cannot agree about which parent should look after their children. NYAS is asked to represent children and young people so that their wishes and feelings are taken into account in these proceedings.

•	 Information about staying safe and links to relevant websites – It is our responsibility to make sure that you are safe whenever we are working with you. We will keep confidential what you tell us unless we believe that you may not be safe, or that another child or young person may not be safe.

•	Further information can be found at www.nyas.net  and http://youngpeople.nyas.net

Follow us on (Twitter icon) @NYASServices and (Twitter icon) @NYASFundraising


Follow us on twitter @NYASServices and @NYASFundraising

title: YMI: Why Am I?
description:
YMI is a platform for Christian young people all over the world to ask questions about life and discover their true purpose. We are a community with different talents but the same desire to make sense of God’s life-changing word in our everyday lives. 

Designed for millennials, the YMI app is an intuitive and accessible tool to help young people learn from their peers' honest and heartfelt experiences of questioning and applying God's truth. These come in the form of original writings such as testimonies, feature stories, and devotions as well as art forms like photography, illustrations, and typography. 

With the YMI app, it's easy to: 
- Select your favorite topics to follow
- Browse and read articles from ymi.today
- Share content using the in-app share button
- Download scripture lock screens for your phone
- Receive notifications about the latest YMI content
descriptionHTML:
YMI is a platform for Christian young people all over the world to ask questions about life and discover their true purpose. We are a community with different talents but the same desire to make sense of God’s life-changing word in our everyday lives.

Designed for millennials, the YMI app is an intuitive and accessible tool to help young people learn from their peers' honest and heartfelt experiences of questioning and applying God's truth. These come in the form of original writings such as testimonies, feature stories, and devotions as well as art forms like photography, illustrations, and typography.

With the YMI app, it's easy to:
- Select your favorite topics to follow
- Browse and read articles from ymi.today
- Share content using the in-app share button
- Download scripture lock screens for your phone
- Receive notifications about the latest YMI content

title: Big Launcher - Launcher For Old Age People
description:
Big Launcher is a application designed to help older people use smart phones more easily. It includes an interface with big icons and big letters to help older people see easily. In addition, the interface of Big Launcher with icons to you can also pin your contact and application outside the home screen to facilitate the use. You can also customize the launcher in its settings. In addition to the elderly, young people can use the smartphone as a simple interface.

#Features:
✓ Simple interface of Big Launcher with icons and large letters suitable for older people

✓ Widget support with big text

comments: Great launcher. Easy too use. Very helpful for seniors. Can read it without glasses.

This was pretty easy to setup for my elderly mother. If they develop this app more it would make it better..... And could charge $$ more for it. I wish you could adjust size of the icons. And my biggest gripe is that you can put icons on the main/home screen. It only has the dock at the bottom and the clock/weather on the top. There is space for at least a couple of icons. As far as functionality it's simple and easy to select which app you want to use.

Though I overall enjoyed this launcher, the lack of access to notification s really limited this launcher. I really enjoyed the large icons. I would like the ability to arrange my favorite apps and the ability to create folder s. My other struggle s are that when choosing favorite apps, the apps already chosen, were not specified by a check mark by it. Also, I could not consistently open the launcher settings with TalkBack.
Love it! Don't need to put my glasses on to see & read everything

Great App! I'm impressed with this app. I'm pretty new to it but I would review my comments here and know if this app would attract 5 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 from me. For now, I recommend this to everyone with android phones.

title: Liderazgo Juvenil Cristiano
description:
Liderazgo Juvenil Cristiano es una aplicación gratuita que te permite navegar a través de toda la sabiduría de la Palabra de Dios en un lenguaje simple y claro con sólo unos pocos clicks

Las mejores claves para obtener un Liderazgo Juvenil Cristiano

Miles de materiales y recursos de la Palabra de Dios para el Liderazgo Juvenil Cristiano

Liderazgo cristiano es ser el cambio que quieres ver en los demás, es usar apropiadamente todo lo que Dios te ha dado, es disfrutar la vida e impulsar a tu prójimo a hacerlo, es servicio, generosidad y entrega.

Para tener un liderazgo juvenil has de tener algunas cosas. En esta aplicación te proponemos una serie de guías para ser un verdadero líder bajo el amparo de la Biblia. Descubre las siete señales y los tips más importantes para ser un verdadero lider cristiano.

Liderazgo Juvenil Cristiano contiene los siguientes temas entre otros:

-Delegar Para Crecer
-Características De Los Jóvenes De Hoy
-Características Del Ministerio Juvenil
-11 Principios Para El Ministerio Juvenil
-Tips para el Liderazgo Juvenil
-Reglas que dan libertad
-Una reunión juvenil dinámica
-¿Por Qué el Grupo No Crece?
-Perfil de los Jóvenes
-Los jóvenes tienen sus necesidades... conócelas
-Líder Desanimado
-Involucra a tus Jóvenes
-Entrenamiento de Liderazgo
-Filosofía de Ministerio: Grupo de Jóvenes
-Desarrollar la habilidad de hacer buenas preguntas
-Consejos para el que desea servir a Dios
-Cómo Saber si tus Jóvenes Están Creciendo
-Consejos para organizar actividades

Dentro de Liderazgo Juvenil encontrarás temas bíblicos tan interesantes como:

> Estudios Biblicos para Jovenes: temáticas especiales para que los jovenes puedan descubrir la Biblia y ser jovenes conforme al corazón de Dios. 
> Noviazgo cristiano: Edifica un Noviazgo Cristiano conforme al corazón de Dios
> Como interpretar la Biblia: Aprenda a usar la Biblia como se merece y a interpretarla bien siguiendo todas las fichas que se muestran.
> Estudio de la Biblia donde encontrarás en Antiguo Testamento y el Nuevo testamento.
> Acerca de la Biblia: Una gran cantidad de preguntas y respuestas que lograrán ampliar nuestro conocimiento sobre nuestro Señor y su Palabra.
> Diccionario Teológico: Totalmente offline para que usted pueda consultar cuando desee todas las definiciones acerca de la teología.
> Temas Bíblicos: dividido en una serie de artículos que van desde el aborto hasta la vida nueva, pasando por temas tan variados como el alcohol, la amistad, la depresión, el divorcio, la homosexualidad, la lujuria, obediencia, paciencia, soledad o tentación. En cada uno de ellos podrás leer un versículo de determinados puntos de los libros sagrados del cristianismo. 
> Métodos de Estudio Bíblico, para estudiar la Biblia tomando en cuenta los pasos de la observación cuidadosa del texto, luego su interpretación, aplicación y correlación, También considera los beneficios de la lectura de las Escrituras y explica cómo preparar, organizar y dirigir estudios bíblicos con el fin de evangelizar y discipular.
> Oratoria: Se dan principios básicos de la comunicación, la pedagogía y la homilética para presentar discursos, conferencias, seminarios y sermones.
> Galería de sermones, devocionales y muchos más recursos.

En nuestra sección "Más Apps Bíblicas" ponemos a tu disposición aplicaciones gratuitas como Biblia de Estudios , Temas Biblicos para predicar , Parabolas de Jesús , Estudios Biblicos , Santa Biblia Reina Valera , Sermones Predicas Adventistas , Devocionales para la Mujer , Estudios Biblicos para Mujeres , Estudios Biblicos para Jovenes y más aplicaciones de Teologia para alimentar tu alma y cuidar tu FE.

Descarga ahora liderazgo juvenil cristiano y aprende todas las consignas para ser un perfecto líder con la ayuda de la Palabra de Dios y la Sagrada Biblia.

Disfruta de Liderazgo juvenil cristiano y comparte con nosotros tu experiencia.

title: Booster Buddy
description:
BoosterBuddy is a free app designed to help teens and young adults improve their mental health.

Manage your personal wellness journey and earn achievements as your sidekick guides you through a series of daily quests designed to establish and sustain positive habits.

•	Check-in with how you are feeling each day
•	Use coping skills
•	Keep track of appointments and medications
•	Get started on tasks
•	Follow self-care routines 
•	Increase real-life socialization
descriptionHTML:
BoosterBuddy is a free app designed to help teens and young adults improve their mental health.

Manage your personal wellness journey and earn achievements as your sidekick guides you through a series of daily quests designed to establish and sustain positive habits.

• Check-in with how you are feeling each day
• Use coping skills
• Keep track of appointments and medications
• Get started on tasks
• Follow self-care routines
• Increase real-life socialization
summary: BoosterBuddy is designed to help teens/young adults improve their mental health.
recentChanges:
-Added coping skills for Obsessive Compulsive Disorder, Disordered Eating, Persistent Pain and Urges to Self Harm
-Added journal section including ability to save specific written quests
-Ability to save favourite quotes
-Ability to switch between quests and come back to them later
-Improved medication scheduling customization
-Increased medication reminders to 10 per day
-Added notched device UI support
-Fixed UI on wider aspect ratio devices
-Improved performance and stability
-Fixed bugs
comments: I feel like this is a really good app, gives me a little bit of responsibility by waking up my buddy and gets me to go out and do simple but meaningful tasks. It also tracks everyday on a calendar so you can see how you've been doing feeling wise and has a journal page, etc. Wish I could interact with the buddy a bit more though. Great app, keeps me going, even on tough days.

I've been using this app on and off for years now, it's simple to use with no ads and a good paced system that engages you to check back every day. I personally love the nostalgic feel of the graphics + it's easy to run because it's not super detailed. it focuses where it matters most with gentle reminders here and there to make sure you're taking care of yourself. I would recommend this app to someone who needs it. if you're unsure, get it. you can uninstall if it's not for you. stay safe! <3

This is a good app for keeping yourself safe mentally, so I find it quite useful. However, I think that the designs of the buddies and UI isn't as clean and pretty as I would like which puts me off using it at times, but that's probably just the visual arts student in me being nitpicky 😖

Great app. In the favorite coping method section, can they be sorted by category (like in the general list of coping methods, but it would only show your favorites) to make it easier to find what I'm looking for. Or at least not have multiple instances of a certain coping method. If the same method is in more than one category and I favorite them both, there is multiples of different methods and it gets cluttered and repetitive

I am blown away. First recommended to me by someone on a crisis text line. I've had it for a week and it is FANTASTIC. I have been keeping more healthy habits because the app makes me feel like I'm achieving something. The journaling section helps me to find joy in little things and expose me to self-commpassion, which is difficult for me. I also love that it has coping skills for almost EVERYTHING, plus a crisis plan. Oh and guys, this app is actually FREE! no in app purchases!

title: Unlocked - Teen Devotional
description:
Unlocked is a quarterly devotional for teens featuring daily readings centered on God’s Word. Each day’s reading—whether fiction, poetry, or essay—asks the question: How does Jesus and what He did affect what we’re talking about? With daily readings designed to encourage discussion and a deeper walk with Christ, teens are encouraged both to engage with the Bible and to write and submit their own devotional pieces to Unlocked.

The Unlocked app is available to teens as a quick, easy way to access devotionals from their personal devices. Every day a new devotional is released, complete with a reading of the devotional transcript for those who would like to listen in instead of reading through!

title: Strong Minds
description:
Strong Minds App is a free app which provides mental health tools through interactive stories, pictures, and guided meditations. We have no ads or fees, and we don’t collect personal information. 

Strong Minds App can help you learn about your feelings and develop practical skills for happiness and resilience. It has many sections and draws from theories such as CBT, mindfulness, and positive psychology. 

Why learn this stuff?
By learning about your feelings and emotions, you can make peace with the difficult ones, enjoy the positive ones, and better understand the people around you. By working with your thoughts and actions, you can also learn how to lift your mood when life gets tough.

What do I need?
This version of Strong Minds will work on most android phones and some tablets. We are currently working on tablet compatibility. 

Is this app for me?
This is for kids, youth, and adults who are young at heart. Whether you want to learn about yourself, improve your mood, or take care of your mental health, this app could be for you. That being said, it is not meant to treat mental illness. 

Strong Minds app includes these sections:
* Find Your Feeling - 35 feelings or emotions with facial expressions, explanations, and possible coping strategies. It includes equal numbers of happy and sad emotions. A new app feature allows you to share your feeling with your friends through text or email. 

* Thoughts - Two entertaining, illustrated stories to learn how thoughts, feelings and actions connect. Another interactive story demonstrates happiness tools. Finally, you are guided through new positive versions of the first two stories. 

* Compare the Stories - Provides an easy review of the characters' problems and solutions. It also demonstrates how one character returns to a positive mood.

* Change Your Thought - Step-by-step process to help you apply what you have learned about thoughts, feelings and actions in your daily life. It also saves a thought record for you to come back to. 

* Feelings - 10 fun and relaxing meditation recordings. Includes guided-imagery, mindfulness, and loving-kindness meditations. These are kid-friendly and are currently being updated. 

* Daily Habit - A simple tracker to help you record the days that you've met your goals.

Disclaimer:
Strong Minds App is not meant to treat illness or to replace professional care. It is also not meant to prevent disease. If you or your child has a mental health concern, you should find a qualified person to help you. If you have anxiety, ASD, or aspergers, you may find parts of the app helpful, but it is not meant to be a treatment.

We are not-for-profit and we hope that you or your kids can get some joy or comfort from this app. We appreciate any feedback so that we can continue to make it better.

Mind Supports Team
strongmindsapp@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Strong Minds App is a free app which provides mental health tools through interactive stories, pictures, and guided meditations. We have no ads or fees, and we don’t collect personal information.

Strong Minds App can help you learn about your feelings and develop practical skills for happiness and resilience. It has many sections and draws from theories such as CBT, mindfulness, and positive psychology.

Why learn this stuff?
By learning about your feelings and emotions, you can make peace with the difficult ones, enjoy the positive ones, and better understand the people around you. By working with your thoughts and actions, you can also learn how to lift your mood when life gets tough.

What do I need?
This version of Strong Minds will work on most android phones and some tablets. We are currently working on tablet compatibility.

Is this app for me?

comments: I read some of the stories with my mum and it became a really good tool to help challenge my negative thought patterns. I learnt a lot of great skills and had good discussions. The app is very interactive and easy to use. I hope there will be more updates of more stories like this. Thank you for making this app and making a difference in my life. :) Cheers
This app is very useful. You should make more apps like this. Very easily understandable and to navigate. Good on you, thank you to the developer

This is one of my favorite apps. I need this to help me almost daily so much so that I kept my old phone just to be able to use this app. I now have an iphone 6+ and it isnt available in the app store. Is it possible to add this app to the iphone please? I dont know how much longer this old phone will work and I dont want to have to give this app up if this old phone stops working. Thank you
Good app. Need to add it to apple store, please.
What stops Strong Mind app unavailable in Swiss ? Why is it not liberalized there ?

title: Estudos Bíblicos para Jovens
description:
Os melhores estudos bíblicos para jovens que você pode encontrar

Encontre aqui uma serie de estudos bíblicos para compreender mais a Palavra de Deus e se aprofundar no conhecimento de Jesus. Estudos Bíblicos para jovens tem informações sobre a Bíblia. Interpretação da Bíblia para obter respostas sobre tudo, oração, fé, conhecimento e muito mais.

Estes estudos Bíblicos para Jovens serão uma bênção e uma ajuda em suas vidas.

Estudos bíblicos para você se aprofundar no estudo da Bíblia, a Palavra de Deus, e edificar cada vez mais a sua vida. Temos estudos novos todos os dias!

Maravilhosos estudos educativos para seguir a Palavra de Deus.

- Os jovens - O Cristão no mercado de trabalho

- Jovens eu vos escrevi …

- Namoro Cristão: Conselhos para não cair no pecado sexual
- Ministério de Jovem: Namoro Cristão

- Tenho uma Nova Namorada 
- “Conselhos a um Jovem” 
- Jovens Em Santidade 
- A Esperança do Cansado e o Saber do Jovem
- 7 dicas para iniciar um Ministério de Jovens
- A linguagem do jovem na pós-modernidade
- O segredo da excelência na juventude
- Jovens sois fortes! 
- Conselho para os jovens 
- Jovens De Cristo 
- Jovens, eu vos escrevi porque sois fracos!
- e máis ..

Além disso, a aplicação inclui para completar os estudos bíblicos:

- Estudos bíblicos sobre a Vida Cristã: Estudos para aprender, estudar e fortalecer a fé nos temas bíblicos fundamentais para a vida cristã.
- Perguntas e Respostas da Biblia: Descubra as questões mais importantes sobre a Bíblia e aprender as respostas
- Perguntas sobre Deus: Encontre respostas bíblicas para perguntas sobre Deus.
- Perguntas sobre Teologia: Perguntas e respostas importantes e para saber mas a respeito da teologia.
- Perguntas e Respostas Vida Cristâ: Encontre respostas bíblicas para perguntas sobre vida cristã.
- Perguntas importantes: Descubra as questões mais importantes sobre a Bíblia e aprender as respostas
- Bíblia Escrita: Consulta toda sua obra quando deseje. 
- Audio Bíblia: Relaxe-se e escuta a Biblia tranquilamente.
- Devocionais diários
- Evangelho Quotidiano
- Podcast Evangelho

Temas e pregações para jovens. Sermões, dicas e estudo da Palavra de Deus. Os jovens não são somente o futuro, e sim o presente da igreja.

Toda a Escritura é inspirada por Deus e útil para o ensino, para a repreensâo, para a correçâo, para a educaçâo na justiça (2 TM 3:16).

Saiba tudo Bíblia nos ensina saturada e expandir seus conhecimentos com estes estudos bíblicos. 

Aproveite a Palavra de Deus e adquira novos conhecimentos todos os dias.

Faça o download agora Estudos Bíblicos para Jovens e partilhar connosco a sua experiência

Deus os abençoe.

title: Read With Me Kids - Make Personalized Books
description:
Make books as a family, then read your custom, personalized books together right on your device. You can also share them with anyone and get awesome professionally printed versions!

Young people love stories about themselves and their stuff!

Printed Books!
• Have your stories professionally printed, bound, and shipped to you
• 7"x9" Softcover or Hardcover
• 40pgs - include up to two stories in one book
• High quality, great value, priceless joy
• New PDF option to print yourself

Share your books for Free!
• Upload to the web with one touch
• Share a link via email or social media with a touch

Story Templates!
• Fun, positive, personalized stories in minutes
• Just take a few pictures and answer a few questions
• Add or remove pages, edit words and pictures
• (You can also start a book from scratch)

Why Personalized Books?
• Helps develop a love of reading!
• Share your feelings and personal experiences
• Fun, educational, quality time!
• Choose your own meaningful topics and pictures for more engagement
• Reluctant readers get excited to read their own stories
• Prepare for new experiences and teach good behaviors: going to the Doctor or Dentist, the first day of school, making friends, sharing toys, a new baby coming, etc.
• Share Family History: how Mom and Dad met, Grandparent’s stories, etc.
• Memorialize a birthday, vacation, or special event

Practice Reading Words!
• Touch a word to highlight it for easy reading

Easy to edit!
• Create a new book from scratch
• Modify and add to Story Templates
• Use new or saved pictures
• 250+ stickers to add to your pictures
• Move pictures and text by touch
• Resize by touch
• Have multiple pictures with borders on a page
• Set a picture as the background of a page
• Choose the text and background color
• Add as many pages as you want

Example Books created with Story Templates
Under McKaylie's Blanket
http://bks.readwithmekids.com/samples/underBlanket5/cover.html

Bedtime For Randy
http://bks.readwithmekids.com/samples/bedtime4/cover.html

comments: This is great for making your own stories for kids. The cost to have them printed is reasonable. Is a great gift idea for a grandchild a niece/nephew or a Godchild. There are some premade template stories you can personalised, but you can't read the story before you buy, which is disappointing. I'm not keen buying kids books without having looked through it, to ensure it's appropriate and something they would enjoy reading. But overall a great app.
Its good and easy to use but you have to buy most of features like text or background colours, plus it doesn't have recording voice or reading option where it can read automatically

I searched for a site like this for weeks before finding this one and I am so thankful I did! For Christmas, I wanted to write each of my children (16 and 13) a book about their lives from birth til now. Every "create a book" app I found had nothing more than picture and caption options. This app not only allowed me to create the gifts I wanted, the service was simply outstanding! It seemed as though they were just as concerned about me getting the finished product in time as I was! oh, and the finished product - Superb!
I love this game but the only thing bad is when I bought the membership thing it would only let me do extra texts... Beside that's this is awesome!
had to uninstall it did not let me use my photo for pages it allowed one to be use for cover page. I really had wanted this app to work. I will trybto download again and see if it works.

title: Teen Chat Room
description:
Do you want to chat with other Teens? Are you a social butterfly that wants to be heard? Download Teen Chat Room, and you can start chatting within seconds.  This app makes it easy to start chatting with people, and find fun new friends . You can meet guys, meet girls and best of all, you get to start a random chat with anyone you want. Who knows, maybe you can meet your new best friend on here. Once you make friends, you can socialize offline by sending them messages for free using our offline message feature. 

We value your privacy, and want you to have the safest chat experience.  You can control your privacy level within the app. You choose who you want to be chatting with. If anyone bothers you, you can report them, and block them from messaging you. The server has a strong language filter enabled, so if you be assured that there will be no foul language. Teen Chat Room is a social chatting app made especially for teens; however, you must have 13+ to sign-up. Anyone younger will need permission from their guardian.

summary: Get ready to chat with other Teens right now!
comments: If this isn't a weird app, I don't know what is. In the chatrooms, there's people either having a convo that wouldn't even make sense 99% of the time + there are bots that are literally spamming names back and forth every maybe 3-5 seconds with each other. Lots of pervs too; 18+ ppl message me although I'm 15. The app gives off a creepy atmosphere/vibe too. Horrible user interface as well. I don't recommend downloading this app either way. Just stick to Discord & other normal apps than this one.

Loging in doesn't work. And by the way, why do you need to use Facebook to upload your profile picture? Some people may not have Facebook and would want to change their profile picture. This app is dumb and belongs in trash, signing in doesn't work, either does loging in, this app is useless.

It's honestly one of the best chatting for teens apps I ever downloaded💖 but one thing that was wrong with it was you had to upgrade your chat to Change your Profile picture 😬 I Will Also rate this a 1 star because You have to have Facebook To Update your pfp but the thing is that you have to install the app if you want your profile picture to change please fix this app😐 if this isn't weird idk what is! -Edited: Tbh it's actually gotten better after this review😊👌

READ THIS. DON'T INSTALL. If only I could rate this as 0 stars I would. I downloaded this yesterday and uninstalled it later on. At first it was nice. But as soon i tried to open the app again, I can't log in anymore. It only says "Permission level: ban". Does that mean that my acc was banned? For what? i didn't even do anything and also it's hard to put up a simple profile photo. I need to download the chat gum app too. I don't know how they're related but that's really hassle.
It is very nice. My experience is nice but they only thing is you cannot upload a pic if you if you don't have Facebook. That's they whole thing so can u please fix it or I will uninstall it

title: One Young World 2019 London
description:
The One Young World Summit 2019 sees the global forum for young leaders return ‘home’ for the first time since the inaugural Summit in 2010. With over 300 languages to be heard on its streets, London is one of the most diverse places in the world. The city is home to nearly 9 million people, one of the world’s biggest financial centres and countless historic sites such as Buckingham Palace and Big Ben. A city where the past and future merge, London provides the ideal backdrop for young leaders from more than 190 countries to work together to accelerate positive change.

The OYW official mobile app of the Summit has the following functionality:
-	 Social media event feeds
-	Ability to chat with other event attendees right within the app 
-	Detailed info about the event including the live agenda
-	Schedule with ability to create personal notifications and reminders
-	Maps with routing functionality
-	Live voting and feedback
-	Attendee profiles and bios

Brett Charles Young (born March 23, 1981) is an American country pop singer-songwriter from Orange County, California.[2] He was a college baseball pitcher but took up songwriting after an elbow injury.[3] His self-titled debut EP, produced by Dann Huff, was released by Republic Nashville on February 12, 2016.[4][5] The lead single, "Sleep Without You", was released on April 11, and he had a major success with his following single, "In Case You Didn't Know". He released his second major label album Ticket to L.A. in 2018

It an excellent app. I have just started using it. And I love it very much. Coz the profile pictures are geniune and there are peoole to chat with. Just cool.

title: TOYA Live
description:
TOYA wants to create a community where you can feel comfortable, where you can make new friends, you can communicate with friends and even face-to-face video chat. Popular people show their charm, make friends, and get fans. 
We have people from many regions and can recommend different content to you. You can also switch regions to meet different people.
Our current user base is very large, mainly young people from universities. But our goal is not limited to this, we hope to attract more groups, of course, this needs your help, if you have any suggestions, you can contact us.

title: Find Friends, Meet New People, Cuddle Voice Chat
description:
Cuddle like HouseParty and ClubHouse -Free Group Voice Chat Room App ❤️: Random Live Chat with Strangers; Seek, Date & Find Friends; Sing, Karaoke & Play Music; ASMR Sleep & Join HQ trivia; Grow Fans & Make Money! Have Fun with Friends at the House party Online!

💕Cuddle is NOT a dating app, even though lots of Cuddle users chat with strangers, find friends, participate in online marriage ceremonies, become real couples, and even find their soulmate. 

📻Cuddle is NOT a radio app, even though we have lots of DJs that host live shows, play music and sing every day, all of whom engage and interact with their listeners and earn money!

🗣️Cuddle is NOT a walkie talkie, even though people call in and talk with each other about all kinds of topics while having fun in the community. 

🎙️Cuddle is a group voice chat room app, where people can enjoy anything they want to kill time and to kill boredom.

Join Cuddle, the leading group voice chat and house party app with over 100k+ Cuddlers online. Listen to live streams, chat with strangers, and find friends all around the world. Best of all it’s anonymous and free to chat and call. Share your thoughts, play music, join trivia, find someone to match with and love, connect to people, find friends, host games, and earn money. Everything is available 24/7. It’s more fun than walkie talkies and radio. An audio version of House party, Twitch and an interactive version of Discord! No matter where you are, you’ll never be lonely again.

What do Cuddlers love about Cuddle?
🆓Join a free random chat room, where you can send messages/emojis, call in to talk and interact directly with a DJ, and send them virtual gifts to show your love and appreciation.
🎖️Climb the leaderboards, with daily, weekly, and monthly DJ/Fan rankings, and you’ll turn into a famous superstar in Cuddle.
🏆Participate in different events to win avatars, badges, and entrance effects, which will all be sent directly to your in-app bag.
👩🏻‍🎤Follow your favorite DJ. Stay connected through direct messages or whisper (private message) your secrets in live rooms.
💞Select single-host live show, multi-host chat room, Dating Game Theme, or password-protected Private Rooms, to just talk to random strangers, find friends, play dating games to find your romantic date and meetup.
🎮Choose topics such as Social Dating, Just Chatting, Relationships, Music, Comedy, Movies/TV, Anime, ASMR/Sleep, Video Game, Horoscope/Astrology, Trivia Games, and Just Talk.
💃🏻Add voice labels to your favorite DJ: Sexy, Cute, Romantic, Friendly, Sweet, Funny, Warm 
🤼‍♀️DJs can invite other DJs to BATTLE using 1V1 PK function.

Why do Cuddlers love Cuddle?
🎧Listen, Chat, and Find Friends
- Are you bored? Listen to hundreds of casual, and friendly group chats with topics ranging from Music, Singing, karaoke, Love, Games, Relationships, Friends, ASMR, Horoscope, Trivia.
- Don’t feel like putting on makeup? It doesn’t matter. We’re different from Caffeine, Bigo Live, Live.me or Periscope, because you can meet new friends without showing your face. Enjoy a live, real, fun, easy, and safe chat.
- Feeling lonely? We have an active community and social club, and tons of talented, singers, Anime and Manga lovers, gamers, comedians.
- Having trouble falling asleep? Cuddle has many sleep casts to help relax you before you go to bed.

🎙️Broadcast, Live and Start the House party
- Launch a chat room with one click. It’s free to use! Broadcast using your voice to connect with audiences. 
- Can you sing? Perform karaoke, or even do a duet with other users. Love music? Play your own music. Remember to interact with your live audience during the house party.
- Share your life, gain fans, receive gifts, and live in the moment!

No matter where you are, with Cuddle, you’ll never be lonely! Enjoy the new era of radio and walkie talkie! Download Cuddle and have fun with new friends at the house party online together!

It's an ok app but personally way too many people hacking on there and taking people's personal information you need to update the app and make it more secure to stop all the hacking
Excellent user interface. Everything is simple and to the point. Enjoyable app

title: Feeling Good Teens
description:
Feeling Good Teens has been developed for the educational project, Positive Mental Training (PosMT) for schools, to develop self-esteem, resilience and goal focused motivation in young adults, (see http://www.foundationforpositivementalhealth.com/for-schools/). 

This project is funded by NESTA (an innovation charity) and is being piloted in 11- 13 year old pupils (senior 1 year) in selected schools across the UK.

The ‘Feeling Good Teens app’ has 9 short (3-7 minutes), age-appropriate relaxing audios, incorporating Olympic Sports coaching techniques. These have been derived from our NHS accredited ‘Feeling Good; Positive Mindset’ app for adults, which contains the full length (18 minutes) PosMT tracks. PosMT has been well researched and shown to reduce worry, and increase mood, self-confidence and sleep.

The app is free to download and comes with 2 free tracks. Please read the details of how to use the app in the settings page. Pilot schools are given free access to all tracks with referral codes. 

Subscription Information:

Feeling Good allows you to upgrade to premium which gives you access to unlimited content within the app 

You have two subscription options:
• 1 Year £9.99
• 1 month £2.49

Payment will be charged to Playstore Account at confirmation of purchase. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription

Terms and conditions: http://www.positiverewards.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Feeling-Good-Teens-App-Terms-Conditions-1.pdf

Privacy policy: http://www.positiverewards.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Feeling-Good-Teens-App-Privacy-Policy.pdf

title: Apple Music
description:
Apple Music gives you unlimited access to millions of songs and your entire Apple Music library. All ad-free and available right from your Android device, iPhone, iPad, or Mac or PC. Try it today. There’s no commitment — cancel anytime.

• Stream over 60 million songs from the Apple Music catalog.

• Follow along to your favorite songs with time-synced lyrics.

• Stream your favorite music via Chromecast to your favorite device.

• Listen without Wi-Fi or using data. Just download your favorites to your smartphone and take your music anywhere.

• Create your own playlists and get personalized mixes and daily recommendations based on the music you already love.

• Watch exclusive content, like documentaries about your favorite artists, concert films, and original TV shows.

• Explore all-new stations, featuring dozens of exclusive shows created by the most iconic names in music. Available live or on demand.

• Listen to broadcast radio stations from around the world.

• Create a profile and follow friends to see music they’re listening to and playlists they’ve shared.

• New members get three months free.

• Availability and features may vary by country or region. Subscription renews automatically after trial.

developerAddress:
1 Infinite Loop
Cupertino, CA 95014
recentChanges:
This update includes Listen Now - an all-new home for Apple Music, an all-new search experience, an enhanced playback experience featuring Autoplay, Crossfade, sharing to Instagram, Facebook and Snapchat Stories, and improved app performance.

For information on the security content of Apple software updates, please visit this website: https://support.apple.com/kb/HT201222.
comments: Was an amazing app the for the past year. We have a mix of Apple and Android devices in the house. Swapped from Amazon Music tAmazon. Last year, felt it was worth the money until this month's update. Wow, it is an incredible step backwards in design and functionality. Playlists cannot be re ordered, it takes extra clicks to do any task...they have until Christmas to straighten it out or I'm back to Amazon.

Great music app, no question there. The recent update to the UI has placed your library as the last item in the hotbar at the bottom. Why? The primary function of this app is for people to listen to the music they want. If people want to discover new music, they will select that tab. Don't force people to go there when they open the app. I think the Spotify app opens directly to people's library. I suggest others try Spotify first.

Seems to me you ruined a good app. I don't understand the order of anything or how to get to anything. 'Listen Now' seems a bit useless & redundant, as we already have radio. Have no idea what you all were trying to do here. Also, I know it trivial, but the colors throw me off the most. You even changed the widget I keep on my phone to a bright pink. PINK. The brightness agrivates my migraines, even in dark mode. At least give people a way to change the colors or opt back to the classic app look.

Good for listening. Can be a pain to get music to download to my device and I really wish I had access to podcasts within the app. The latest update is stupid annoying. The listen now, browse and radio option are all basically the same thing, put it back. I hate having my main menu on the right side now. If you're going to do an update make podcasts accessible. It also randomly will pause my music for no apparent reason.

There's an issue with sorting your library. The only options are playlists, artists, albums, songs and downloaded. Theres an edit feature where you can select the desired ways to sort your library but it does not work. I would like to sort by genre. There has been plenty of updates over the years however this issue has never been fixed.

title: Amazon Kindle
description:
READ ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
On the bus, on your break, in your bed—never be without a book. Built for book lovers, the Kindle app puts millions of books, magazines, newspapers, comics, and manga at your fingertips.

FIND YOUR NEXT GREAT READ
- Find your next great read with Kindle. Choose from over six million Kindle books (including those with Audible narration), magazines, audiobooks, and comics and start reading in seconds. Explore new releases, Amazon Charts best sellers, and titles across genres like romance, science fiction, children’s books, self-help, religion, nonfiction, and more—and try any book before you buy with a free sample.

- Subscribe to Kindle Unlimited to enjoy unlimited reading and listening. Explore over 1 million titles, thousands of audiobooks, and current magazines for just $9.99 a month.

- Over 1,000 books, magazines, comics, and more included with Amazon Prime.

- With Kindle Daily Deals, save up to 80% on a new selection of books every day, including romance, science fiction, non-fiction, and books for young readers.

GO BEYOND PAPER
Turn your phone or tablet into a book with the free Kindle app—so you can read anytime, anywhere. Explore these reading features in the Kindle app:

- Read your way. Customize your text size, font type, margins, text alignment, and orientation (portrait or landscape)—and choose whether to turn pages from left to right or continuously scroll. Read comfortably day and night with adjustable brightness and background colors. Go to the Aa menu in your book to get started.

- Look up words, people, and places while you read. Breeze through words you don’t know and characters you can’t remember with the built-in dictionary, X-Ray, Wikipedia lookup, instant translations, and search within your book. Simply tap and hold a word to view its definition, or use the Google and Wikipedia links to get more information.

- Track your reading progress. See what percent of the book you’ve read, real page numbers (for most top titles), and how much time you have left in the chapter or book based on your actual reading speed. 

- Bookmark places you want to revisit, and make highlights and take notes throughout your book. Open My Notebook to see all your notes in the same place.

- Hop, skim, and jump with Page Flip. Flip between pages or get a bird’s-eye view of your book with Page Flip—don’t worry, we’ll save your place.

- Zoom in on high-definition color images in Kindle books, magazines, comics, and manga.

- Sync your books across devices. When you’re reading a book, the Kindle app will automatically sync where you left off—along with any bookmarks, highlights, or notes—so you can start reading on one device and pick up where you left off on another. 

- When you can’t read, listen. Switch seamlessly from reading your Kindle book to listening to the Audible book, all within the Kindle app. 

- Get notified when authors you love have new releases, or when books you’re interested in go on deal.

recentChanges:
- You can now see books shared with you through Family Library, with filters for just your items or items shared with you.
- When reading the same book on multiple devices, the Most Recent Page Read from your other devices now appears in Page Flip View and Continuous Scrolling.
- You can now permanently delete content from your library.
comments: I love the Kindle app! Never thought I would read e-books because I prefer to read a physical copy, but with covid and recently down sizing e-books are so much easier to read, and store! They take up no space. Best of all with the free Kindle app you can read books for free. Other books do cost but you do not have to buy anything to be able to read! Book lovers need this app!

This app is well done as expected from Amazon. However, my biggest frustration is that highlighting is based on whole words and not characters. There are times where I will need to highlight one word and the current highlighting system makes it impossible without highlighting other objects around it. There are apps that allow for character based highlighting. Please change this and I will change my review to 5 stars.

Bug-ridden garbage. Latest update 28/1/19 just marked all my books as new & unread when most of them should be partially or wholly read. So much for "bug fixes"! October 2020. There's an expression, "If it ain't bust, don't fix it." Doesn't apply in this case. Definitely bust. Oh, and you'll need a magnifier to see the new Aa menu.

The Kindle icon recently disappeared from my screen, so I reinstalled the app. The icon has re-appeared, but when I try to open any book from my library I get a message saying that Kindle has closed. Kindle no longer works on my device (Google Nexus). Does this have anything to do with the upgrade on 15th October ? If this isn't fixed soon I'm going to be asking for a refund for all the Kindle books in my library. Not happy.

App itself is ok, latest update is hot garbage. Honestly I'm amazed they haven't hotfixed it yet, considering all the people who can't use the store at all right now. Pretty tired of getting push notifications, only to select them and get an error when it tries to display a store page. My other major annoyance at the moment - they decided to default to autoscroll instead of page flip, even when you've previously turned it off. How hard is it to just set it according to what the user specified?

title: OMG! Young Adult Cancer Summit
description:
The 7th annual OMG! Cancer Summit for Young Adults (April 24-27, 2014 - Palms Casino, Las Vegas) is the premiere oncology conference and social networking event for the young adult cancer movement. A pivotal healthcare event, OMG is one of the largest gatherings of young adult patients, survivors, caregivers, professionals and advocates in the world. The event inspires thousands to get organized, build community and unite as one to drive change.

The official OMG! Cancer Summit for Young Adults app will help attendees navigate the conference by providing an interactive schedule and hotel map, as well as links to all sponsors and exhibitors.

title: Young Berlin
description:
Young Berlin is the new app of our guidebook “Berlin for Young People”.
284 pages of useful information, city maps, subjective impressions, insider tips and a comprehensive address section. The new edition is now available, in a fully revised version.
You will find the book in every good bookstore for 8.50 €. We can also send it to you. Postage and packing in Germany is free.

The app gives you more than the complete address section of the book, always up-to date. We will continue developing the app. The next steps will be navigation, connecting places to tours, saving favorites…

The book offers a comprehensive address section plus articles about history, culture life in the city, excursions and maps with tours through different neighborhoods.
descriptionHTML:
Young Berlin is the new app of our guidebook “Berlin for Young People”.
284 pages of useful information, city maps, subjective impressions, insider tips and a comprehensive address section. The new edition is now available, in a fully revised version.
You will find the book in every good bookstore for 8.50 €. We can also send it to you. Postage and packing in Germany is free.

The app gives you more than the complete address section of the book, always up-to date. We will continue developing the app. The next steps will be navigation, connecting places to tours, saving favorites…

The book offers a comprehensive address section plus articles about history, culture life in the city, excursions and maps with tours through different neighborhoods.
summary: Berlin: Best insider tips - stay up to date with our new app
recentChanges: Bugfixes
comments: This app is perfect for finding local spots on the fly. Great user-friendly interface. Very practical on the go.

title: Among Us
description:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship. 

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
descriptionHTML:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship.

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
summary: Join your crewmates in a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal!
developerAddress:
PO Box 2532
Redmond, WA 98073
recentChanges: * Add support for 6 digit room codes.
comments: This is a very fun and addicting game, I love all of the features but I would recommend to add some features like:- 1. Creating an account and having the same name, but you can change it anytime you want, so by having an account we can add friends. 2. Add a voice feature for more fun, but still the chat feature should be there for people uncomfortable to talk. 3. Changing the amount of impostors and changing the map while being in the lobby as people misclick usually. I hope you can add this.

Great game. Has clearly grown in popularity since lockdown: almost everyone i know is playing it! I have a few improvements though that may make the game more enjoyable for people (like me) who cant spend money in games. One thing i would suggest is adding 'achievements', so that players can unlock some pets, skins, etc. Of course, you could also buy them with real money, but this gives people a chance to earn them instead of buying them. Also, seasonal kill animations would be cool. (Xmas, etc)

I honestly didn't get the point of it all, until I played it. The game is great! And as an app is even better! Getting used to the controls takes a bit of time, but it's surprisingly user friendly. My only problem so far has been with the keyboard (it blocks the entire screen and is really slow, but only ingame) and how other apps, specifically Messenger, can't display over it.

Very fun and addictive game!! However there are a few bugs and tips I could give. For me there is a glitch as the imposter where someone will report a body or call a meeting, but, I will hear the chat going off but im still playing the game, and everyone is frozen. Idk if that has happend to anyone else but if you could fix that that would be great! And also being a ghost is kind of boring. If you could give the ghost some extra things to do that would also be great. Other that that great game!

The game is amazing. Love the simplicity of the game, very enjoyable when playing with friends. Which brings up the topic of a friend system, sometimes it's hard to gather close friends. You can often meet some great people in lobbies, but the only problem is you cannot add them to play in the future which is a shame because this can definitely keep the community growing/make players stay. Love the game none the less. (Also hoping to see more add ons/maps in the future!!)

title: Paper.io
description:
Paper.io ! Check out the latest game by Voodoo.

Your goal is pretty simple to get ? Conquer the largest territory.

It seems simple at first since the game is very easy to handle. But beware it might be a bit harder to master.

Whether you’re bold or careful, outwit your opponents by finding the best strategy to conquer the largest space. And stay cautious, you have a weak point : your tail. If ever it is touched by an opponent, you are dead.

Also make sure to guard your territory because in Paper.io nothing is sure as long as you do not own the whole territory. Stealing is legal and your opponents won’t hesitate to do so.

After the success of Quiz Run and Bool, Voodoo offers a new and fun experience inspired by io type games (popularised by agar.io). Find the simplicity and strategy on an io game in within a unique graphic universe.

Paper.io is for the whole family and requires no Internet connection.
