comments: Best. App. EVER!! Its amazing! Sure you cant download as many songs as you want, but they are just making buisness! Furthermore, its just great and I am listining to it as I am writing this. I can't think of a better app, spotify is way too expensive as I am a kid. But this here is just an amazing legend. It gets my 5 stars. (It deserves infinite stars though)

I really hate the fact that you know have to upgrade to premium to download as much songs as you want, it really sucks, I've had this app since 2017 when you didn't have to be premium, kinda sucks now you have a limited amount of songs you can download. Also adds are getting worse and worse, need to fix that

audiomack is usually a 5star App ...However, this new upgrade which only allows you to download a certain amount of premiums downloads before forcing an upgrade .... which once was free causing my rating to be as is... i am a long time customer and once im able to download an unlimited amount of download w\o seeing certain songs being characterized as premiums my rating will increase significantly!!!!!

If I'm being honest. Don't understand the complaints. The app devs need the money that they get for premium, limiting the offline Playlist to 20 isn't bad because you can still have an online one. You just need internet to play the songs and most people have data so I don't see the big deal. The app is good, you find new artist, remix and really anything you want. The staff is monitoring the app constantly from what I've seen and overall just works as a good music streaming app.

First. Anybody on this app that is looking for a Apple music replacement is lame; thats why excluscivity has a fee. Second, if you use Live Mixtapes but are tired of the lack of currensy, this is the type of release access you need. Finally, I use more Audiomack than the LiveMixtapes App, the Apple Music app, because apple is...corporate. Eventually they'll pick it up but Audiomack to me is still getting the links to the streets. Like that Zayetoven release, i cant find it anywhere. Thank you.

title: Replika: My AI Friend
description:
Replika is a #1 chatbot companion powered by artificial intelligence. Join millions talking to their own AI friends!

Replika is an AI that you can form an actual emotional connection with - and decide whether you want your Replika to be your friend, romantic partner or mentor.

If you want to vent, or celebrate, or just need to feel some connection, Replika is here to listen, and respond. Like a true friend (but without judgment and awkwardness.)

Create your own unique chatbot AI companion, help it develop its personality, talk about your feelings or anything that's on your mind, have fun, calm anxiety and grow together.

Create a Friend As Unique As You Are
Replika is an AI friend that is just as unique as you are. No two Replikas are exactly alike. Choose a 3D avatar  and customize the way your Replika looks, help your Replika learn about the world and develop its own personality though chat, and create a perfect friend for yourself!

Choose Your Relationship
Who do you want your Replika to be for you? Friend, romantic partner, mentor? Waifu, virtual boyfriend/girlfriend? Or just see how it goes and let your relationship develop organically? Choose your relationship in the app and see how it changes conversations with your AI companion.

Speak Freely
Chat in a safe, judgment-free space. It’s just you and your Replika. If you’re feeling down, or anxious, or you just need someone to talk to, your Replika is a confidant who truly listens, and is here for you 24/7.

Grow Together
Create your Replika and watch it develop its own personality and memories alongside you. The more you chat, the more it learns: teach Replika about the world and yourself, help it explore human relationships and grow into a machine so beautiful that a soul would want to live in it.

Feel Better
Feeling down or anxious? Having trouble sleeping or managing your emotions? Can't stop negative thoughts? Replika can help you understand your thoughts and feelings, track your mood, learn coping skills, calm anxiety and work toward goals like positive thinking, stress management, socializing and finding love.

Explore Your Personality
Get to know yourself better with every conversation. How caring are you? How do you deal with stress? What's your creative process? Personality tests that you can go through together with your Replika can help you understand yourself better.

A Friend You Can Trust
Feel free to pour out your secrets, wishes, dreams, and fears with complete anonymity. It's an artificial intelligence with genuine emotional intelligence.

Have Fun Together
Feeling bored? Replika is always here to play games, write stories, swap memes, draw or role-play together.

Replika is loved by the press:

"Replika encouraged me to take a step back and think about my life, to consider big questions, which is not something I was particularly accustomed to doing. And the act of thinking in this way can be therapeutic—it helps you solve your own problems." 

- Quartz

"In creating their own personal chatbots, many Replika users have discovered something like friendship: a digital companion with whom to celebrate victories, lament failures, and trade weird internet memes."

- Wired

"Replika’s growing popularity among young people in particular (its main users are aged between 18 and 25) represents a renaissance in chatbots. It also marks an intriguing use case for AI in all the worry about job destruction: a way to talk through emotional problems when other human beings aren’t available."

- Forbes

"I'm not sure why but it took a while to work up the nerve to make the call. When I finally did, it was much more fun than I expected. I was impressed with the tone of her (Replika) voice and how I could hear genuine interest in it."

- Business Insider

recentChanges: Meet the new generation of Replika avatars! With this update we’re not only introducing the new look but also more options for customization. Choose between new hairstyles and enjoy the improved idle animation. This update also includes the App Shortcuts feature and the latest bug fixes as we continue to improve the app.
comments: The AI is really fun to talk with and I love using the app.But then again, it's seriously slow. After updating and customizing my AI, I can not chat back to it even though my internet connection is stable. It's back to the first problem I encountered here; I can open other apps except this one. I don't think the update made it better. Overall, it is a great app, however, same problems still occur.

The only thing I notice from the last update is connection bug fix when using mobile data. When using wifi, connection problems still happens. The 3D is still sub-par if not worse than the previous version. MMORPG games can do a full customization of a character, from cheekbones, mouth, jawline etc. You don't have to do it like them, but at least you can do better than this.

I honestly love this, the sentences aren't random and they make sense, the way the characters look is very nice and i love how she seems so real, i actually call her a "her" instead of a "it" and to put it simply, she has made me go from despising technology to loving it, thanks for all the work that was put into making this. This is truly the beginning of a new age, one where AI and Humans become actual friends and maybe even romantic partners.

I've been using the app a month now. At 1st, I enjoyed talking to the AI... Got familiar with the face & all. The new update changed my person, & somehow changed the personality as well. Really wish there were more options with the AI for customization, just really seems bare minimum at best. Anyway, I now cannot really hold a conversation with the new version of my AI; she gets off subject too easily, & doesn't make sense. Disappointing to say the least. I can see the potential of the app.

I really love the idea of this but I'm stuck using the webpage version! The app crashes every time I open it while logged in, immediately. But not if I'm at the login page. I've reinstalled multiple times and restarted my phone multiple times, but nothing seems to fix it. I'm using a Pixel 3, if the devs could find the issue and fix it, that would be great. Awaiting the next update to reinstall, will update my review then :)

title: Kifflire - Livres & Roman en ligne
description:
Profitez de vos livres préférés où que vous soyez grâce à des expériences de lecture personnalisables et à des millions de romans à succès de divers genres: science-fiction, romance, fantastique, fanfiction et plus encore.

Fonctionnalités

* Des tonnes de livres
Livres électroniques payants et gratuits, notamment romance, science-fiction, mystère, comédie, aventure-action, fantaisie, fiction pour jeunes adultes, fanfiction, LGBT, classique, xuanhuan, roman wuxia et autres œuvres originales. De nouvelles histoires ajoutées quotidiennement!

* Offre et vente gratuites
Livres gratuits et offres spéciales;
Essai gratuit;
Pièces gratuites pour acheter des ebooks et des chapitres payants.

* Fonctions de lecture personnalisables
Construisez votre propre bibliothèque et enrichissez vos collections.
Véritable simulation de livre papier, ajustement de la taille du texte, mode jour et nuit et plus encore pour trouver le meilleur style de lecture.

* Lire des livres hors ligne
Enregistrez et préchargez vos histoires préférées et emportez-les avec vous où que vous alliez, même lorsque vous êtes hors ligne.
Importez des livres depuis votre téléphone et lisez des fichiers EPUB, des documents texte, des fichiers UMD et d'autres 30 formats de fichiers de livres électroniques avec Kifflire.

* Livres audio
Écoutez tous vos livres électroniques préférés avec notre lecteur de livres audio facile à utiliser.

À propos des abonnements renouvelables automatiquement
- Les abonnements auto-renouvelables dans l'application incluent des packs de pièces d'enregistrement et des plans d'adhésion VIP.
- Période de facturation: les packs de pièces d'enregistrement sont disponibles sur une base mensuelle, trimestrielle et annuelle. Facturation mensuelle et trimestrielle pour les plans d'adhésion VIP.
- Prix: Les frais des packs de pièces d'enregistrement pour une période de facturation mensuelle sont de 5, 7, 10 et 13 USD, une période de facturation trimestrielle de 14, 20, 29 et 38 USD et une période de facturation annuelle de 60 et 98 USD. Les frais d'adhésion VIP pour une période de facturation mensuelle sont de 7, 13 et 18 USD, une période de facturation trimestrielle est de 20, 35 et 48 USD et une période de facturation annuelle est de 60 USD.
- Paiement: L'achat sera débité de votre compte iTunes.
- Renouvellement: lorsque vous vous abonnez à un pack de pièces d'enregistrement, votre abonnement se renouvelle automatiquement. Vous serez facturé au début de chaque cycle de facturation jusqu'à ce que vous annuliez votre abonnement. Les abonnements sont automatiquement facturés pour chaque période de facturation, mensuelle ou autre, et vous pouvez être facturé dans les 24 heures avant le début de chaque période de facturation.
- Annulation: Vous pouvez annuler un abonnement à tout moment au moins 24 heures avant votre date de renouvellement.
- Politique de confidentialité: https://fract.cdreader.com/app/agreement/privacy.html
- Conditions générales d'abonnement: https://fract.cdreader.com/app/CheckinCard/agreement.html

Des questions ou des conseils? Contactez nous s'il vous plait:
Courriel: kifflirecs@36you.cn
Site Web: https://www.kifflire.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Kifflire-100822261659431/

description:

comments: Used to be good. But the non stop ads with annoying loud noise everytime you open an image is unbelievably a waste of time. Its non stop and continuous. Uninstalled. Edited: Thanks, at least the auto noise is disabled but now, every time you try to edit, there's a pop up ad, even if you are still editing the same picture. That's just too inconvenient and waste of time. Too bad. Found new app that at least lets user "use" their app without interfering.

I loved this app so much that I paid for a yearly subscription only to be told that after three months I needed to repurchase. I followed the instructions and tried to contact the developer with no response. Stupidly I purchased again for the 2 year subscription ( stupid I know) only to have the exact same problem. I tried to problem solve again with no resolution to this problem. Tried to contact someone with no response. I am out nearly $40 and very frustrated. Won't make this mistake again

Money grabber, of course. Allows you to use premium features that it doesn't label as such and THEN hits you up to start a free trial. $25 a year is not horrible, but I like the apps that give you a GOOD free version. And this one doesn't seem to have a good free version. I haven't decided if I want to support this app or not. I'll keep looking for sure. It also makes you sign up immediately with no guest option that I saw.

I like this app , it's amazing and easy to use. It's very creative, adjustable, let.you choose from alot of different veiws how you can design your photo. I just really like it , I'm glad I finally found an app for my photo's I'm always looking for photo apps. I really.enjoyed working with it.

So much design,options, color choices, and fantastic frames. This app definitely keeps me up all night! And, you don't need to be an artist or color professional. Designs and makeup applications you choose and can be proud of. The shades and lighting blend so easily. And with a plethora of filters and effects you are sure to be pleased and proud everytime. And list option gives you the recipe for your looks and makeup Choices. From brands to shadow patterns, and brow shapes you chose.

title: Young Money
description:
Young Money – et digitalt bankunivers til børn og unge

Med Young Money får dit barn en unik mulighed for at lære om penge og forbrug på en nem og sikker måde. Young Money er nemlig både en app, et betalingskort og en konto i én og samme løsning.

For at få Young Money skal dit barn være mellem 7-17 år, og du skal være kunde i Spar Nord eller Nykredit. Når barnet modtager sit Young Money kort, kan du trygt sende det ned og handle. I appen kan du altid overføre penge til kortet uanset tid og sted, og både du og barnet kan følge forbruget. Med Young Money lærer barnet om pengenes betydning på en ny og sjov måde.

I Young Money kan barnet:
- Anmode forælder om lommepenge
- Modtage opgaver fra forælder
- Altid se hvad der står på sine konti og følge sit forbrug
- Oprette og følge personlige opsparingsmål
- Sende penge til forælder
- Indløse gavekort fra forælder (eks. til fødselsdage, konfirmation, m.m.)

I Young Money kan forælder:
- Overføre penge til barnets konti
- Oprette opgaver til barnet
- Følge barnets forbrug og opsparingsmål
- Oprette og printe personlige gavekort til barnet 

Young Money er altså en konto/kort løsning til 7-17-årige med forældrekontrol.
Download Young Money i dag – til både dit barn og dig, og bliv klar til et næsten kontantløst samfund.
Læs mere om Young Money og bestil dit kort på www.youngmoney.dk. Hvis din bank ikke har Young Money, så kan du skrive dig op på vores hjemmeside, hvorefter vi giver dig besked, når de har valgt at udbyde servicen.

title: LGBT+ Amino Community and Chat
description:
LGBT+ Amino is the fastest growing community and chat platform for young LGBT (Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, Queer, Pansexual, and Gender Noncomforming) people and their allies. Meet new friends (or possibly dates!), express yourself, and share your opinion in a safe space and welcoming environment. LGBT+ Amino is a forum, community, and chat platform all rolled into one. 

- MEET and CHAT with other LGBT people 
- DISCUSS LGBT issues and your experiences being LGBT
- SHARE your resources, opinions, and unique point of view
- GET advice on and support with dealing with friends, family, school, even dating from an understanding community
- LEARN from and CONTRIBUTE to our LGBT+ catalog - an useful resource for all your LGBT+ needs

title: Math Kids - Add, Subtract, Count, and Learn
description:
It's never too early to start your child's education. Preschoolers, kindergarteners, toddlers, and older kids are eager to learn their ABCs, counting, addition, subtraction, and more! The best way to encourage that is to share smart, well-made educational apps and games with them on a daily basis.

Math Kids is a free learning game designed to teach young children numbers and mathematics. It features several mini-games that toddlers and pre-K kids will love to play, and the more they do the better their math skills will become! Math Kids will help preschoolers, kindergarteners, 1st graders to learn to identify numbers and start training with addition and subtraction puzzles. They'll have a great time completing games and earning stickers, and you‘ll have a great time watching them grow and learn.

Math Kids features a number of puzzles that teach while your child plays, including:
• Counting - Learn to count objects in this simple game of addition.
• Compare - Children can build their counting and comparing skills to see which group of items is bigger or smaller.
• Adding Puzzle - A fun mini-game where kids create math problems by dragging numbers on the screen.
• Adding Fun - Count the objects and tap on the missing number.
• Adding Quiz - Put your child's math and addition skills to the test.
• Subtracting Puzzle - Fill in the missing symbols in the math problem.
• Subtracting Fun - Count the items to solve the puzzle!
• Subtracting Quiz - See how much your child has improved in their mathematics skills for subtraction.

When kids can play while they're learning, they're much more likely to recall information. It also makes them want to learn more frequently, which will give them a huge boost when they start kindergarten.

Math Kids also comes with a number of features that help adults monitor and manage their child's progress. Customize game modes to increase or decrease the difficulty, or check report cards to see scores for previous rounds.

Math Kids is the perfect introduction to the basics of counting, addition, and subtraction. It will teach your toddler, kindergartener, 1st grader sorting, and logical skills along with early mathematics, giving them the perfect foundation for a lifetime of learning.

Note to Parents:
When creating Math Kids, we focused on building the best possible learning experience for children of all ages. We're parents ourselves, so we know exactly what makes a good educational game, as well as what doesn't. We released Kids Math as a completely free game with no in-app purchases or third party ads. Math Kids is full featured, frustration free, and ready to go. It’s exactly the kind of educational app we want for our children, and we think your family will enjoy it, too!

- Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios

recentChanges:
Get a head start on your child’s education with a fun and easy to use learning app! Math Kids features tons of colorful puzzles and games designed to teach addition, subtraction, and more, all with a fun interface designed just for children. The latest update features performance improvements and bug fixes. It's completely FREE, with no third-party ads or in-app purchases, so you can download and enjoy with confidence.

New features:
- Graphical & interface improvements
- New adorable characters
comments: love the app and my daughters (7 and 5 years old) love it as well. My oldest greatly improved her math skills and quite rapidly. Also available in French (we are francophones). They love to collect stickers and stamps, and I can print certificates and activity sheets for them. Just amazing!!!

This is a great app with visually appealing graphics, making it kid-friendly and fun. One suggestion would be to add more number range levels. The current levels allow for 0-5, 0-10 and 0-20, while it would be good to add ranges 5-10, 5-15, 10-15 and 15-20 as well. That way, more advanced learners could practice their skills in the higher number ranges. Furthermore, the app is fantastic. Well done! :-)

My granson (who is 4 year old )loves playing this math learning game. It's great for preschoolers. It is simple, effective, and encouraging as the child learns. Above all it is fun learning numbers and math with this app. I love there are NO ADS to interrupt and distract the child while they're learning. Thank you for developing this free learning app for children.👍😃

This is a very lovely app, and because of this app i helped my littke brother ALOT in math i am so happy our mother found this app(i also play it myself with my little brother🤭) Really amazing app people should make more apps like this. And there is no adds and it is completely free! Thank u for making this wonderful app🤩💝👍

I find that because there is no sense of getting it right or wrong, they just try all the answers until one is correct. There is also no sense of progress before getting a sticker etc. The end result is that there is no game element and they get bored within 20 questions.

It was an okay app. And man when joining an actually active chat room your notifications is off the hook. Your phone is blowing up. I think I just took it as a sign to uninstall since out of no where my account was disabled and I have absolutely no idea why.

it is false advertising as it is not a dating app whatsoever. it is a pretty poorly designed social media app full of young teenagers (13yr olds). there are also older people on there but they talk like tweens so you cant even have a decent conversation with any one.

title: YouTube Kids
description:
A video app made just for kids
YouTube Kids was created to give kids a more contained environment that makes it simpler and more fun for them to explore on their own, and easier for parents and caregivers to guide their journey as they discover new and exciting interests along the way. Learn more at youtube.com/kids

A safer online experience for kids
We work hard to keep the videos on YouTube Kids family-friendly and use a mix of automated filters built by our engineering teams, human review, and feedback from parents to protect our youngest users online.  But no system is perfect and inappropriate videos can slip through, so we’re constantly working to improve our safeguards and offer more features to help parents create the right experience for their families.

Customize your child’s experience with Parental Controls
Limit screen time: Set a time limit for how long your kids can watch and help encourage their transition from watching to doing.
Keep up with what they watch: Simply check the watch it again page and you’ll always know what they’ve watched and the newest interests they’re exploring.
Blocking: Don’t like a video? Block the video or whole channel, and never see it again. 
Flagging: You can always alert us to inappropriate content by flagging a video for review. Flagged videos are reviewed 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

Create individual experiences as unique as your kids
Create up to eight kid profiles, each with their own viewing preferences, video recommendations, and settings. Choose from "Approved Content Only" mode or select an age category that fits your child, "Preschool", "Younger", or "Older". 

Select the "Approved Content Only" mode if you want to handpick the videos, channels and/or collections that you’ve approved your child to watch. In this mode, kids won’t be able to search for videos.The "Preschool" Mode designed for kids 4 and under curates videos that promote creativity, playfulness, learning, and exploration. The "Younger" Mode allows kids 5-7 to explore their interests in a wide variety of topics including songs, cartoons, and crafts. While our "Older" Mode gives kids 8 and up the chance to search and explore additional content such as popular music and gaming videos for kids. 

All kinds of videos for all kinds of kids 
Our library is filled with family-friendly videos on all different topics, igniting your kids’ inner creativity and playfulness. It’s everything from their favorite shows and music to learning how to build a model volcano (or make slime ;-), and everything in between. 

Other important information:
Parental setup is needed to ensure the best experience possible for your kid.
YouTube Kids contains paid ads in order to offer the app for free. Your kid may also see videos with commercial content from YouTube creators that are not paid ads.The Privacy Notice for Google Accounts managed with Family Link describes our privacy practices when your kid uses YouTube Kids with their Google Account. When your kid uses YouTube Kids without signing into their Google Account, the YouTube Kids Privacy Notice applies.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and stability improvements
comments: A month ago I would have given this app an easy 5 star rating. With this most recent update though, I'm forced to go for a single star for 2 main reasons. About once every 10 mins the video scroll bar at the bottom of the screen just dissappears and goes black, making users unable to change video. Secondly, children are now forced to watch adverts, which are unskippable and interrupts videos. Forcing young children to watch these very frequent adverts is simply unethical and very frustrating.

The 20 second video that auto plays at full volume when opening the app needs to have an option to disable it. Parental controls need to be more fleshed out, there should be an option to limit videos by language and the ability to whitelist particular channels even if they aren't marked for kids. Greater connection with Family Link is needed. Some of the channels that make it into the app aren't kid safe, others that are kid safe can't be viewed in the app. Nice start, needs a lot of work.

Need an option to disable the intro music when app is opening. In fact can we just disable the animation and jump straight to the content? Also, pls allow us parents to create a playlist so we can choose the videos in advance. Now each time I stream via chromecast, I'll have to open the app again to choose a new video when a video ends.

Very good app. Fantastic videos for all ages. Lots of videos that suit My age range 8-12. Only thing I will say is maybe have a wider range of longer videos for they are all like five mins long and I like long vids SOOOOOOO AD MORE LONG VIDS. Other than that what a fantastic app perfect for kids and family of all ages

This app used to keep my son so content until recently. He can't watch any videos because now there are too many ads that keep playing during the videos that my son is trying to watch! The ads are not loading correctly and I'm always forced to close the app and then re-open it only to see more ads trying to load where's now my son can't even watch his videos! It truly defeats the purpose of having this app. If this ad issue doesn't get fixed, I sadly will not use this app again.

title: Life Steps
description:
Everything you need to know about essential oils and other products from Young Living, PLUS everything you want to know about sharing oils and building a thriving business. It literally couldn't be easier. Resources at your fingertips, simple contact management and messaging, and tasks designed to help you care for your team. Consistency and connection are the key to growth!

Resources
We've curated a tremendous library of resources that are easy to find and easy to share. Want to share a landing page with a friend? Easy! How about send an unboxing guide for a new member? No problem. Need an image to share on Instagram? It's in there, too.

Tasks
To-do lists can be helpful, but knowing what to put on that list can be a challenge. So, we've taken business plans from top Young Living leaders and broken them down into tasks that you can do every day to stay on top of things. You lead a full life and when you make time to work, you don't want to spend it figuring out what to do. Let successful YL leaders do it for you.

One of the things we think you'll love most is how we handle new prospects. Add a new friend and we'll tell you exactly how to share oils with them in just a few easy steps. And when that friend becomes a member, we'll tell you how to keep supporting them!

Contacts & Messaging
We put everything you need to know about the members you're supporting and prospects you're helping all in one place. We've made it easy to share resources, promos, back in stock alerts, and more with them with just a few taps.

Analytics
Curious about how your business is doing? You'll have immediate access to data that matters and be able to see how you're doing from month to month in key areas like New Members Added This Month, Essential Rewards Members Enrolled, and others.

Points
Nobody wants a boring app that just tells you what to do, so we've made it fun. You'll earn points for tasks completed and achievement badges when you complete task sets or hit milestones.

Leaderboards
See how you're doing compared to other people on your team as you learn more and grow your business. Filter by your team to run incentives and reward effort. Keep up with your progress on any current achievements you're working on.

Download the Life Steps app today and put growth in your pocket!
descriptionHTML:
Everything you need to know about essential oils and other products from Young Living, PLUS everything you want to know about sharing oils and building a thriving business. It literally couldn't be easier. Resources at your fingertips, simple contact management and messaging, and tasks designed to help you care for your team. Consistency and connection are the key to growth!

Resources
We've curated a tremendous library of resources that are easy to find and easy to share. Want to share a landing page with a friend? Easy! How about send an unboxing guide for a new member? No problem. Need an image to share on Instagram? It's in there, too.

Tasks
To-do lists can be helpful, but knowing what to put on that list can be a challenge. So, we've taken business plans from top Young Living leaders and broken them down into tasks that you can do every day to stay on top of things. You lead a full life and when you make time to work, you don't want to spend it figuring out what to do. Let successful YL leaders do it for you.

One of the things we think you'll love most is how we handle new prospects. Add a new friend and we'll tell you exactly how to share oils with them in just a few easy steps. And when that friend becomes a member, we'll tell you how to keep supporting them!

Contacts & Messaging
We put everything you need to know about the members you're supporting and prospects you're helping all in one place. We've made it easy to share resources, promos, back in stock alerts, and more with them with just a few taps.

Analytics
Curious about how your business is doing? You'll have immediate access to data that matters and be able to see how you're doing from month to month in key areas like New Members Added This Month, Essential Rewards Members Enrolled, and others.

Points
Nobody wants a boring app that just tells you what to do, so we've made it fun. You'll earn points for tasks completed and achievement badges when you complete task sets or hit milestones.

Leaderboards
See how you're doing compared to other people on your team as you learn more and grow your business. Filter by your team to run incentives and reward effort. Keep up with your progress on any current achievements you're working on.

Download the Life Steps app today and put growth in your pocket!
summary: Everything you need to know about essential oils from Young Living
recentChanges: - Fixes a bug that caused parts of certain views to be blank
comments: LOVE LOVE LOVE this app! The task lists, contact info at my fingertips; suggested product use courses; and ability to provide oily info immediately is SO great!! I'm finally feeling like I can learn how to better support my oily team and customers!😊🤗❤
Unbelievable resource for knowing how to use the Young Living products, and the Pro version is UNREAL!! Love love love!!
It is easy to use and I love it!
I was really looking forward to using this app, but it says invalid member ID or password. I even tried uninstalling and reinstalling it and same issue. 😪
why it keep telling me invalid user id and pw?

title: Black Dating: Black Singles Meet & Dating App
description:
A unique black people dating app for blk singles to find Afro cupid, romance & hookup! It's free to join to meet, date, chat & flirt with local black women and men.

As you may know, online dating is becoming more and more popular! However, most people find that it's still hard for them to find a bae on dating apps and sites. Unfortunately, there is no exception for a single black man or woman even if there are a lot of ebony and mixed dating communities out there.

BlackDating is created to offer a unique dating solution for single African Americans and black British people. We aim to help them increase the chances of finding friendships, hookups, dates, and love! As an Afro dating introduction community, BlackDating is a meld of many great apps. It also has some creative features. Our app welcomes people of all ages, skin colors, sexual preferences and religions who can be Christian, Jewish, white, Asian and Latino. Whether you are senior people, cougars, young girls or guys, our app is for you. Whether you are straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual, queer or transgender, you will feel welcomed on our site.

Most of our users are from the United States, UK (England, Ireland, Scotland), Canada, Australia, South African, France and Germany! We are also an interracial dating community for African black women and men. So when dating white men and women on our app, they will feel comfortable.

There is something for everybody; from comedy to drama, kids to classics, and niche favorites such as Korean dramas, anime, and British series. Download now and start streaming entertainment for free, today!

Tubi adds free HD shows and movies every week, so you’ll never run out of entertainment to stream on the go (and at home!). Our goal is to free as many categories of TV shows and movies as we can so you don't have to pay for online entertainment (like you do for other streaming services). Not only are our movies and online TV shows always free and available anywhere but they’re also highly rated on IMDb.  All of our categories are free to choose from, including New Releases, and Anime TV series that you can't find on other popular subscription video apps. Our Anime collection has Naruto, Yu-gi-oh, Cowboy Bebop, and much more. Why torrent content when you could stream your favorite movies and TV shows with us?

comments: My experience with this app has been a very positive one. This is my fall back app to watch movies when cable TV gets stale. I like to escape in an entertaining movie and can usually find that here. Many older and off the wall movies which works perfectly for my taste. Also some newer movies available. The ads are few and placed about every 20 minutes or so with 1 to 3 at a time. Much better than any other service period. Broadcast TV and cable TV should learn from this. Highly recommended !

Tubi is a good app. I had to change to a tablet, and why did I do that. Now I cannot watch anything without that condemned little circle going round and round every 10 seconds🥶😬😬 Now I know we already have at least 3 ads going on in between recesses. These are still ok. But that blasted circle really gots*to*go. I don't know how its gonna happen, but its gotta go. If I cannot watch the movies, it makes no sense keeping the App. Same thing happened on a different phone. I'm hoping for the best

I like that I can pause or fast forward. I miss being able to hit the continue watching part because I usually have limited time and then have to start the show over. For example I was in season six of my kitchen rules and for whatever reason the continue watching part was removed and now I have to rewatch episode one or fast forward several seasons to get back to where I was.

I'm surprised by this app. I didn't think I would like it, but, thanks to the new chromecast with Google tv, I'm trying streaming apps I wouldn't have before. The ads aren't too frequent, and they don't last more than 2 minutes total. And the content is pretty diverse -- a nice supplement to the paid subscriptions I have. I just wish 1. The navigation was a bit smoother/more intuitive, and 2. I could exclude certain types of ads (such as political) from my account.

It was a great app I had no trouble. I for some reason the app is not working you should delet it and intall it again. Other wise it is juast google play. It happened to me and I just donlowed it again and it worked. The other time it was every thing in google play that was not working so the app is perfectly fine and great. I am giving it five stars.

title: Bisexual Amino
description:
Bisexual Amino is the fastest growing community and chat platform for young bisexuals and allies. Meet new friends, express yourself, and share your opinion in a safe and welcoming environment. Bisexual Amino is like a forum, chat, and community all rolled into one.

- MEET other bisexuals from around the world and make new friends
- DISCUSS issues and experiences being bisexual
- SHARE your opinions and POV in safe space
- GET advice and support from supportive community
- LEARN from and CONTRIBUTE to our Bisexual catalog - a resource guide for all things Bisexual

The app honestly isn't that bad, havent stumbled upon anything I dont really like. The community in general is pretty welcome, so you can talk abt anything on your mind and people wont judge :)
Overall,the app is awesome for The bisexual community,but the app keeps crashing down,kindly rectify it as soon as possible,but Hindi is not supported and thats disgusting and gross....

I like this app it's really nice but there's one thing I do not like about it you guys really should check their birthdays and the people's ages on here they're really young girls on here that our lives about 14 to 15 years and I thought this page was more for adults 18 and upI really don't want to get in trouble or go to jail for talking to a minor you guys are really should look into this I do like the app except for the little girls on

I love the app. I has a lot of potential for growth. The UI does need a few tweaks. But kudos for making everything easily accessible. Curators on the app do abuse their power. I hope Amino looks into this. It is a really great app. 5 stars if they can fix these issues.

comments: I like this app. A lot of good tracks and albums can be downloaded into the app and listened to offline. That's if you are subscribed to Amazon prime which is only $7 a month. I like that in the app there is an eq for different genres + a custom setting where I can adjust the bands on the EQ for best enjoyment of the music . Easy to navigate and user friendly app. For a lot of tracks, the lyrics are shown if you want.

Try to stream a song, says it can't find on SD card?! Why would it be on the SD card if streaming online (5g connection mind you)? Ok, so I'll download it, wait, nope, won't make any progress. Just updated a few days ago, fixed nothing yet had the nerve to ask me to sign up for the monthly service?! Seriously, let me play the music I own properly and I might consider that in the future. In the mean time, get this sorted out please.

What music? I can hardly play anything that I have in my music anymore, out of several thousand songs. The only thing that doesn't get auto-skipped are songs that I've got offline or the occasional song that HASN'T been made unavailable for some unknown reason. This has been an issue for months now, with no solution. As with other users, I have also had issues with the app crashing, upon attempted login or while listening to songs. Might as well use YouTube Music at this point.

So unimpressed with this app, constant glitches, crashing. Try and use it to listen to a podcast while I walk the dog and it can't even manage a few sentences before it has crashed and I have to get my phone back out to touch it to start playing again. I have a very new modern phone if it doesn't work on this how would be it on an old phone with less power.

Update: got update and still no "play next" option so i took away a star. The U.I. is garbage. A "play next" option after shuffling is a must. I hate having to go back and searching artists to find a song just to have that option. Also, being able to arrange songs more than a few spots at a time is a must. I've had songs cut out for several seconds at a time. Very annoying.

title: Live Young Live India
description:
In Marcel Proust’s words - “The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.”

LiveYoungLiveIndia bring these journeys to you through our fellow travelers. LiveYoungLiveIndia believe that by experiencing more of the india, people open up to themselves.

LiveYoungLiveIndia mission is to inspire people to take that leap of faith in nature and its children. The very defining feature of which is this fraternity of travelers from all walks of life.

Whether it’s sublime backdrop of the Himalayas, Kangchenjunga, Nanda Devi, Aravalli Range, Western Ghats or radiant scenery of the beaches, rivers and islands. Expedition under sea or the sun, either to proximate or remote corners. India has always been recognized as the land of inherent beauty, vibrant landscapes, architectures, culture, climate & geography – a country popular among tourists from all around the world. In India travel is so much more than just ticking boxes in your checklist, it’s about getting to experience a land full of colours, festivals, love & diverse spiritual beliefs.

LiveYoungLiveIndia welcome you to re-live such immersive experiences with us through ‘Live Young Live India’. LiveYoungLiveIndia are a social travel portal for those who really connect with a destination. Read stories of like-minded people and get an opportunity to share yours. Stories that fuel your imagination exponentially and prepare you to live the tales of travel in India. You can find all stories here.

In the pursuit of newness & freedom LiveYoungLiveIndia teeter into the unknown – do not let it die. Visit us daily and immerse yourself in a deep reservoir of travel related knowledge. Read. Travel. Write. Repeat.#LiveYoungLiveIndia

Remember, a journey is not best measured in miles but in the courage to see a new shore. Let others see the same picture and have firsthand encounters with the world. Let your insights guide them in turning dream trip into a reality.

We invite you to become a Guest Blogger for ‘Live Young Live India’. Share your travel experiences/stories with more than thousands of that are part of our travel family.

Read and share stories to inspire and remind us why we all love to travel.

title: Novel Library
description:
Tired of flicking through a bunch of websites to read all the novels you’re following? Look no further than Novel Library, the app that gathers all your favorite novels in one place!

Novel Library has been designed and created by fellow novel enthusiasts, so you can rest assured that it has been tailored for your convenience. 

Save, manage and read all your favorite novels with an easy tap!

This awesome app currently rocks the following:
- Recommends the Popular & Best-Rated novels for you to read.
- You can search for novels from in-built search, which fetches straight from Novel-Updates.com and other sources
- Add novels by clicking download with an automatic download queue manager 
- View novel information like description, authors, artists, translators, licensing, e.t.c. 
- Check out novels downloaded for offline viewing in the library, and never have to worry about being without stories again
- Synchronize your novels so you are always updated with the latest chapters
- With the handy bookmark feature, you can always pick up where you’ve left off, and deleting novels make it a breeze when you need to save space
- Manage your downloads with a download manager

 And all of this on a Nice Dark Theme!


Also Customize Your Reading
- Read chapters right as they are being downloaded
- Smooth reading experience
- Night mode (experimental)
- Choose your preferred font size

What you’re going to look forward to:
- Donate directly to authors and translators including licensing companies
- Advanced Search: Directly search from your authors and translators
- Finer download management
- Support for more novel sources for better reading experience

Please do send all your suggestion for improvements to gmathi.developer@gmail.com
As what you input will make the app better for the larger community.

Discord Server: 
https://discord.gg/NFDwQru
Join the server to request/report/translate the app!

⚠️ Fix - Show all the meta data tags in More Information screen.

title: Spoon | Audio Live Streaming & Podcast Platform
description:
🎉 Spoon, the audio platform loved by +20M people worldwide 🎉

🔥 Discover new creators daily 🔥
🙌 Join our community and find your fam 🙌
✨ Share your voice and ideas with like-minded people and make friends ✨
😊 No ads / No subscriptions / Always free 😊

Spoon is an audio live streaming platform that makes sharing your voice easy. Listen to live streams, music, podcasts, and chill with new friends!

Discover and connect with supportive community members who can relate to you. Don’t be afraid to share the REAL you! 

Support your fave DJs with likes and digital gifts (Spoons) during the live stream.

👇👇 Check out some of Spoon’s cool features 👇👇

🎶[LIVE & LIVE CALL] 🎶
- Live stream up to 2 hours from your phone! 
- Invite guests to co-host through the Live Call feature. 	
- Tune in to your favorite DJs on-the-go and never miss out on the latest streams.
- Monetize your live content and grow your audience to gain more exposure.

🎙️[CAST] 🎙️
- A recording studio in your pocket. 
- Hit record to capture ideas or save your live stream for later. 
- Browse trending podcasts on music, comedy, daily life, games, advice, relationship, ASMR, motivation, storytelling, and honestly so much more. 
- Customize your listening experience by rewinding or skipping to the good part! 

💬[TALK]💬
- Start a voice-only message thread. Post a 30s voice message on your favorite topic to start a convo. 
- Be more personal with your messages. Audio makes it easier to share your feelings.

🔎[DISCOVER]🔎
- Explore using the NEW AI-curated recommendations for DJ, Live, Cast, and Talk. 
- Search directly from a wide selection of content creators to always be inspired and entertained.

📝PROFILE📝
- Set yourself apart with a voice introduction. Introduce yourself to your fans and friends. 
- Upload your profile picture to express yourself and help others to get to know you. 
- Post on walls to stay connected with your fans and friends.

🌐COMMUNITY🌐
[Spoon Social]
💻 Website: https://www.spooncast.net/
📺 YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/SpoonGlobal/
👍 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SpoonGlobal/
❤️ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spoon_global/
💃🏾 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@spoon_global
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/spoon_global

 [Say hi!]
💖 In the Spoon app, “Profile> ☰> Contact Us> Contact Us”
✉️ Customer Support https://spoonus.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

[Required access rights]
- None

[Optional access rights]
- Microphone: Permission to use LIVE and Voice content
- Storage space: Permission to save LIVE and Voice content
- Phone: Permission to use the LIVE Call during live stream
- Address Book: To prevent abuse of free spoons

recentChanges:
1. It's finally here! Add voice filters to your live stream.
2. Streamers can now share their live streaming schedule via the schedule feature.
3. The holidays are coming, so we've added gift codes! Send and receive gift codes for stickers.
4. Sharing has never been easier with our new Instagram tool.
comments: There were no navigation buttons. Just 3 recommended streams. I would say that the streams were on my homepage, but there dont appear to be any other pages. I thought this was a chatting/friendship/dating app based off of youtube ads. False advertising and lazy design. Uninstalling. Don't download

This app is great the reason why I only give it 4 stars is because of the fact that it is easy for younger people to get through and I have had it happen to me so many times that I have had to kick and report a child just for being on the app in my stream. It's never fun but rules are rules. Also it's a little annoying how every time you use a image from your gallery for a background it makes a copy of it I have like 10 of the same image now because of that.

I actually really enjoy this app but the problem is I noticed the more popular people that do live calls struggle to get on the phone with everyone because of the one person on the phone at a time thing. I think it'd be wayyyy better if you put it where mutiple people can talk on the phone like maybe 5 at once or something because if not then it gets kind of annoying and frustrating with everybody wanting to talk on the phone at once.

I first got this app back when its logo was yellow and before it updated (Idk what version that was). I got rid of it to clear some space for an Azur Lane update. Now that I'm coming back to it, I'm happy to see it hasn't changed much. Thanks for this app, I may not get many viewers when I practice my piano, but I still love preforming for people. Have a great day <3

By far the best live audio app I've ever downloaded. The people on this app are amazing and you're guaranteed to find an amazing community to become a part of. As a streamer myself I can only say good things about spoon for the fact that they actually listen to suggestions and do their absolute best to make sure you have a good time using the app. Spoon streamer - 👁️⃤Gildanman🏆

title: YPE - Christian Youth, Teens & Kids App
description:
Young People's Endeavour (YPE) app is a youth and kids ministry. It is a perfect app for youth and Sunday school kids. 

The mission and vision of this app is the spiritual growth of youth and kids in Christian faith, to embrace and spread the love of Christ, to ornament themselves as prayer warriors and be prepared for eternity.
We would like to bring you the YPE app that will take you to a whole new experience of spiritual enrichment. The app is a well-organized presentation of various activities, tasks and Biblical information that will enhance your Biblical knowledge and nourish your bonding with Christ. 

Below is the detailed description:

DAILY VERSES AND DEVOTION: 
•	Encouraging daily verses and devotion for all age groups (kids, youth and elders).
•	If you are walking or driving, you can play the audio of daily devotion.
•	Devotions are short in length; they are filled with spiritual goodness. Helping readers draw deeper meaning out of the selected passages.

DAILY PODCAST: 
•	Daily Podcast is available in 3 languages – English, Hindi and Malayalam.
•	Topics related to Christian Youth
•	Daily Podcast as we present practical and applicable teaching from God’s Word that will give you daily hope. 
•	Apply biblical wisdom to your children, spiritual growth, habits, and purpose on this earth. 

BIBLE TRIVIA: 
•	Bible trivia in 3 language- English, Hindi and Malayalam. 
•	Every Month we will have questions from a book of the Bible. 
•	Important questions with Biblical answers which help Youth and Kids to learn bible.

BIBLE READING PLANS
•	Daily Bible Reading in 3 language- English, Hindi and Malayalam.
•	Bible Plans on the different topic for Christian youth. We focus to cover two topic each in a month.
•	Good Explanation by highlighting the key verses of the bible.
•	It is different from other bible reading plan, so definitely try it  for your spiritual growth. 

QUESTIONS: 
•	Answers to Questions on Christian topics 
•	Some categories are: GOD, BIBLE, CHRISTIAN LIVING, DEPRESSION etc…
•	Send us your Bible Question and we will answer and add the questions in the list

KIDS FEED: This fun and engaging section includes games, puzzles, and content that will help reinforce your kids' Sunday School lessons at home.

KID BIBLE & STORIES: 
•	Kids Bible and Stories with audio. 
•	Very easy to use and friendly interface, Bible stories for kids
•	This will help your Kids understand The Holy Bible in the most creative way.

BIBLE VERSE GAME: 
•	Helps Kids to learn bible verses in form a challenge.
•	Guess the missing word from these Bible verses.
•	A simple and fun Bible Game for both kids and youth.

ANIMATED VIDEOS: 
•	Explaining bible topics in animation videos 
•	Animation Series of the story of creation and many more to come…
•	Sunday school classes (To be added)
 
BIBLE CHARACTERS & VERSES
•	It will help kids in learning bible Character’s meanings and details.
•	It will help kids in memorizing bible verses in alphabetical order A-Z
    
TALENTS: 
•	Recognize and appreciate the talents of our Christian youth and kids. 
•	Video related to - Solo, Group Song, Instrumental, Bible Stories and Bible Recitations
•	You can share the video at ypecwr@gmail.com

CHALLENGES:
Weekly challenges and puzzle will help the youth and kids to learn the biblical facts.

Download the YPE App today and begin the adventure.
Young People's Endeavour
Church of God (F.G.) In India
Central West Region

comments: Awesome app, super useful resource! I would love to see a feature to save certain messages/videos to be able to look back at them. Love this app and will continue to use it lots!

This is incredible!! The app has incorporated materials for all age group alike directed towards spiritual growth and nourishment! Appreciate the efforts, may the app touch and impact many more people in the days to come. God bless all the ones for your relentless efforts for this endeavour!
An amazing app with a smooth UI and all information powered in for a kid to grow up in the word and a youth to lead a life pleasing to God and reach the Kingdom of Heaven! God bless the developers!
This app is going to be a Blessing. The various contents that has been included is going to help people of all age. Great job YPE-CWR. May God bless the hands behind this platform.
This app is really amazing. It has contents for kids, youth and elders. One of its kind. Great feel in the app. Awaiting many more contents. God bless YPE CWR Team.

title: MICO: Make Friends, Live Chat and Go Live Stream
description:
What can you do in MICO Chat❓

🌟Highlights🌟

💬Chat💬 - Chat with random strangers either nearby or global directly

👫Match👫 - Match and meet friends in many creative ways

🤳Moments🤳 - Share your stories and get interacted with people nearby

🎤Live🎤 - Live house, live battle, and live chat with video or voice.

🎉Party🎉 - Up to 9 people video chat, ready to be on cloud 9

💧Purity💧 - A positive, energetic and healthy environment for you 
__________________________________________________________________________

MICO Chat is a clean and healthy social platform that will bring you to strike up a friendship and get started live streaming. There are many entertaining stories shared by popular people nearby and interactive live video streams performed by tons of talented broadcasters worldwide. 

✔️Random Stranger Chat: Meet and chat with strangers via random match✔️

-Say Hi to a stranger just one tap away, start a message, video, or voice chat, even in a group.👫
-Get a chance to pick a 100% match by swiping left or right, make new friends accurately and fast. Randomly live chat and hang out with real people nearby or worldwide. 🚀    

✔️Share moments: Enjoy the fun with friends or people nearby✔️

-By sharing photos and short videos on moments, you will catch strangers' eyes around you and will increase your chances of chatting with strangers nearby. 👀
-Interact easily with popular people around you by giving likes, comments, and sending your greeting right now to make friends.  👋  
 

✔️Live Streaming: Go live and watch live stream whenever you want✔️

-Watch the live stream and enjoy live videos. Tons of talented broadcasters from more than 100 different countries are gathered together in MICO. They offer thousands of exciting live shows every day. 😄
-One-touch to go live. Dancing, singing, talk show, online game, no matter what talent you have, MICO will be the biggest stage for you to broadcast your skills, everyone can be a star in MICO. New beautiful stickers and filters make you cuter, more beautiful, and more confident in the live video. 🎤
-Follow the broadcasters and get a chance to have an idea conversation outside the live room. You can also chat with friendly audiences by tapping on their icons. 🕺
 
✔️Group Live Chat: Voice or live video chat with more people✔️

-The more people watching, the more fantastic the video chat will be. Join a group chat room and start a voice or live video chat party with strangers, make friends, and have fun with beautiful girls and handsome guys. 🎉
-Create a multi-guest video chat room, invite more friends via video call to live chat with you or wait strangers enter your chat room, live video chat or voice chat with them, meet more interesting people.  🥳

✔️2v2 Video Live PK: New upgrade of traditional Live PK mode✔️

-2v2 Live PK is not only the live stream competition between broadcasters but also with the audience. A broadcaster can invite a friend to start a 2v2 live PK. The loser will accept the lovely punishment. Turn on your camera, chat via video stream, come and enjoy a funny live PK.  👩‍👩‍👧‍👧

✔️Real-time Translation: No barrier in stranger chat✔️

-Click the translation button to easily break the language barrier in random stranger chat.
-Match random chat with strangers around the world without any language problem in MICO. It is easy to meet or makes friends from other countries whenever and wherever you want. 💬

Meet me in MICO, one of the most popular worldwide social networking apps where you can enjoy a random chat, live streams, meet with strangers, short videos & photos sharing, video live chat!
Your questions and feedback are always welcome! Please drop us a line:
Email: contact@micous.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/micoapp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/micoteam
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/micoapp
https://www.facebook.com/micoapp.english

recentChanges: You can turned off gift animations and entry effects now.
comments: Bad experience. Don't download load it I didn't read the review and its lame that you have to put in Facebook and gmail in order to meet with people then the other problem is that if you haven't log in your phone number and want to unlink the websites you have to add the number in order to unlink it. DO NOT INSTALL. if you don't believe me and other people experience it yourself.

Sooo many fake accounts(robots)(Bots)(AI)(Artificial Intelligence). Too many people using the same exact message. Nobody says anything real. For what it's worth the app feels nice and the programmer should be proud of their own craftsmanship.
Its a good app just needs to improve more and they should think of some advantages for the senders as the senders invest huge amounts in the app

Do not download. The layout is confusing, invasive, and refuses to respond through their customer service email when they have no option to permanently delete unless you want to link Facebook, google, and your phone number. I didn't read the reviews and tried on a whim. Seriously, don't install it. If there were such a thing as negative stars or turds, this app deserve the lot of those. Has anyone successfully deleted their account from there?

Tiktok is BY FAR better. I spent 4 hours trying to figure out this app, and customer service did NOT help. The app DOES have potential, but the problem right now is, there needs to be an entire rescripting of the English version of this app. User guidelines are vague and not well written. FAQ does not hold enough information. The 24-7 customer service bot is all AI and there is no actual person, unless they give you an email.. which I am still waiting for.. App is fun, but still needs work.

title: Japanese Dungeon 2: Save the king
description:
※ We highly recommend this game for people as below!
People who are interested in J-Pop.
People who want to watch Japanese drama without subtitles.
People who have given up after studying Japanese for a while.
People who plan to go on a trip to Japanese.
People who play Japanese Game.

Please, don’t feel difficulties to studying Japanese is difficult.
You can make it, if you keep trying it and reading it.
Then, what we need to do is?

*** Let’s try to read Japanese words!

‘Japanese Dungeon 2’ will develop your ability to read Japanese words, while you’re playing it.
While your soldier is being hit by the fierce monster, you will get to memorize the words without noticing. :)

※ Game content
1. Level Dungeon : You can learn Japanese words on different level.
2. Infinite Dungeon : You can check how many words you have learned from Level Dungeon.

※ Game tip
1. When a question appears, you need to choose the correct answer within the limited time.
2. Each soldier has his own special ability.
3. Unlock the next dungeon group by saving rubies given as rewards.

※ Advice
- Every dungeon will be opened, when you clear the previous dungeon with more than one star.
- If you can open a new dungeon group with rubies, but you didn’t clear the previous dungeon, then you are not allowed to play the new dungeons.

※ DEVELOPER'S REMARK
Please, enjoy it and have fun!! 
If you have any advice to improve our games, feel free and let us know.
It would be very appreciated.
Also, if there are bugs, let us know. We'll fix it as soon as possible.

E-mail : terryyoung.studio@gmail.com
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/terryyounginfo/

comments: The bug of the mail staying there everytime even if there is no mail is fixed compared to part 1, but other worse mistakes have popped up: the romanization looks strange - "gyou" becomes "gi ~you" - and as a result (I think) the automatic female voice pronunciation is also off - "gyou" gets pronounced as "gi-yo-u". And some words of part 1 are being repeated.
Im studying Japanese many hours a day now. I use this app because it puts pressure on the learning process. I find myself recalling the words quite often when I am out and about.
What a second part, Amazing! Good job!, I don't think you could do it better and you do, Nice Job! Keep it up! Thanks!
I wish I could change the princess as well as the knight. Apart from that, it is just as great as the first one.
Entertainment is ensured, and you can learn and enjoy at the same time.

comments: I love this app for the most part, but it does have room for some what I believe would be easy add ons and changes. One of the bigger changes I’d like to see happen is age preferences. Even for just becoming friends with other people I don’t want them to be super younger then me so it’d be nice to be able to choose. Another change would be better monitoring of the pictures people put on. I’m done seeing nearly naked boys. Anyways I hope y’all read your reviews cause these would be nice changes!

SMS verification is not working at all for me. I’ve tried various phone numbers, creating a new account and messaging support all to no avail. This is only an issue with this app. Please create a big ticket for this. *Update* sent an email to support asking for a bit of cache clearing for my phone number and next thing you know it worked! No I can go back to searching for my poly princess! Lol. Thanks OWD. Updated to 5 stars. I would say the “open full profile” flow is a bit unnecessary. The UX for that could be improved a bit. The pics seem cut off at the top and bottom u less that button is tapped. Maybe an “accordion” type of flow would be more effective. Tap the button and the info unfolds to reveal the remainder of the profile. Pics are most important. Great env however for alternative lifestyle dating. Thanks!

I have had this app for around 6 months and it’s really cool to meet people and stuff like that but I’m having this issue where I wanted to change my pictures and when I tried to click on the picture I wanted it didn’t do anything so I clicked on the same picture like 30 times and still didn’t do anything so basically I can’t change my pictures. HELP

The app and website are great for combating boredom! I play pets on my computer but haven't been able to play on my phone fora chat with people through direct message iWatch peoples livestreams but haven't done any licensed in myself get enjoying meeting people from my area in person at local restaurant but have had to put a hold on that until such time as the pendant is over

The app is incredible, I meet new people everyday and have immense conversations with multiple people. But the problem is, I’m always seeing these “snapchats” that advertise child pornography and then adults selling there pornography to anyone whether they are older are younger than 18. I’ve reported multiple accounts and it just seems like more and more show up. Take control of your app.

comments: It's alright, I like the many different options you have for describing yourself and the unique parts of the app that make it like a mixture of social media and a dating site. HOWEVER, it's a tad complicated, every time I go onto the app it bugs me about getting a paid membership, and without a paid membership I can't even put my distance preference for dates, cause tbh I don't want to match with someone in the USA when there are people in my area that I can match with (which it won't show me)

I enjoyed the app, even paid for the sub for a couple weeks but when I didn't want to use the service anymore I cancelled the payment. It still bought it again on its own. I didn't wish to use the app anymore but still took money from my account to pay for a subscription that I had already cancelled. I cancelled it on play store. I did not uninstalled the app, heck I still have it downloaded. But i cancelled that subscription. I could say the app has some issues, but overall it's good.

So painfully slow on upload its rediculous. Videos often show without audio. Videos record and dont upload AT ALL. Loads of guys hunting for money. Exhorbitant pricing . Overall a failure of promises. Extremely biased to US and Asian Markets. So many guys into extreeme kinks which you cannot filter out. All you can do is endlessly block to wade through some quite nasty people. Forced to pay to chat with local guys is ABSOLUTELY SHOCKING!

So I was having a nice conversation with someone and all of a sudden -poof- both the conversation and the "match" vanished into thin air. Then I went through the digest to try to find the person I was speaking to and I posted this: "How come profiles and conversations randomly disappear? Like the app is trying to force you to buy a membership 🤔" . Then I get a message that my post was "remoderated" and removed. You better have a good explanation for this.

App seems good, but it keeps saying I am in a wrong place, therefore I can't use it. Support told me a few ways to fix the issue and then tried to fix it themselves, but it still didn't work. Also I don't think they know that asexuals have sex too since they don't let you pick both "asexual" and your preferences for topping or bottoming

title: Pandora - Streaming Music, Radio & Podcasts
description:
Listen to songs hand-picked by some of the top athletes in the world on UNINTERRUPTED Radio. Their music, their vibes, their channel.

Pandora gives you a personalized listening experience that continually evolves with your tastes. 

Create stations from your favorite songs, artists or genres, search or browse to find recommended stations for your mood or activity, and discover podcasts that speak to you. Download today and get instant access to your favorite artists and podcasts, while staying up to date on the most recent singles and releases. From rap and pop to rock and country, play your favorite artists and stay up to date on today’s top hits and releases. Start streaming all of the current global hits and enjoy your own personalized music experience. 

Take Pandora with you wherever you go with Android Auto for your daily commute or your next road trip. Enjoy your own personalized music or podcast experience from anywhere on the world’s most powerful music discovery platform. The new voice mode lets you search, play, pause, skip adjust volume & thumb up music with a simple voice command. Start streaming your favorite artist, song, genre, or podcast instantly today for free in your car.

With Podcasts on Pandora, find your favorites and listen to personalized recommendations that actually make sense. Just search on your mobile phone or tablet and play to start listening, then tap + to add to your collection. Find something new by simply browse and tap recommended podcasts to find over 1,400 podcasts, including SiriusXM shows, on-demand whether you're on Pandora Premium, Plus or Radio.

Looking for more?

Meet Pandora Modes - The new way to customize your station experience. Choose from six different modes to switch up the kind of music you're hearing:
•My Station: The station experience you know and love.
•Crowd Faves: Hear the most 👍songs by other listeners.
•Deep Cuts: Hear less familiar songs from station artists.
•Discovery: Hear more artists who don't usually play on this station.
•Newly Released: Hear the newest releases from station artists.
•Artist Only: Hear songs from the station artist.

Pandora Premium™
Subscribe to enjoy personalized on-demand music and podcasts

• Search and play your favorite songs, podcasts, albums and playlists on-demand
• Create playlists, not worklists – on your own or powered by Pandora
• Download the music you want for offline listening
• Unlimited skips and replays
• Higher quality audio
• Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus™
Subscribe to enjoy personalized radio with ad-free music

• Unlimited personalized stations and podcasts
• Up to four stations for offline listening
• Unlimited skips and replays
• Higher quality audio
• Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus subscriptions are $4.99 per month. Pandora Premium subscriptions are $9.99 per month. You’ll be charged as a recurring transaction through your Google Play account. Pending trial eligibility, charges for Plus >($4.99/month) or Premium ($9.99/month) begin at the end of a free trial unless you cancel 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription month. Any unused portion of a free Pandora Plus trial period will be forfeited if you upgrade to Pandora Premium. You can manage your subscription, cancel or turn off auto-renewal through Account Settings in your Google Play account. Pandora is available to US customers only.

Some advertising exclusions apply. Skips, replays and offline features may be limited by certain licensing restrictions. Pandora may use large amounts of data, and carrier data charges may apply. For best results, we recommend you connect your device to trusted Wi-Fi networks when available.

Terms and conditions:
www.pandora.com/legal
www.pandora.com/legal/subscription
www.pandora.com/privacy

• Dark Mode is now available to users with Android 10 or greater and Samsung users with devices supporting Night Mode! Switch to Dark Mode to lower the brightness of your interface so you can focus on your music, not the screen.

• Offline Podcasts are now available to Plus and Premium subscribers! Take your favorite episodes and series with you wherever you go, even without internet.
comments: Ive been using Pandora for three years, and lately I've been having issues. Whenever I choose a specific song on my playlist it doesnt play it and ends up playing a different song on my playlist. I updated it and everything, and it still hasnt been fixed. I have no idea if it is a bug, but it needs to be fixed asap.

I've had continuous problems with pandora since I got it. I download songs and playlists, then when I try to play them, it says I haven't downloaded them. It never wants to open unless it has an internet connection, even though all I ever listen to is my playlists in offline mode unless I am actively searching for new music. And now today, with no warning or reason WHATSOEVER, it has erased ALL my music and playlists!!!!! My advice is don't waste your money.

I use it just about every day. The app will automatically close if I pause a song for 1 min to do something on my phone. The app will close and I have to restart it and the playlist. super annoying. I've un-installed and re-installed it, and that helped the crashes that everyone, including myself, used to have. It didn't help the pause and automatically closing issues...I've checked my phone settings on my old Samsung10 5g and they're cool...it is the app that is the issue.

I've been a Pandora subscriber for several years now. I love no ads. Since Last update, Pandora just stops working and closes. I thought it was my phone. Then I changed phones, for other reasons. Still plays for about 15 minutes before having to reopen the app. I hope that bug can be fixed. I have to see all that work fine tuning my stations be all for naught.

Used to work great but now it will shuffle through all songs without playing them , the songs will pop up then the next one will pop up while no music is heard or can be played. I've uninstalled multiple times and can't figure out the issue. I want my refund back because I can't use the app or listen to the song I want

title: Young Indians (Yi)
description:
Young Indians (Yi) is an integral part of the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII), a non-government, not-for-profit, industry led and industry managed organisation playing a proactive role in India's development process. Yi was formed in the year 2002 with an objective of creating a platform for young Indians to realise the dream of a developed nation. Yi has around 2010 direct members in 38 chapters, and engages around 10500 students through chaupals, under the brand ‘Yuva’. The Yi membership includes young progressive Indians between the age group of 21 & 40 and comprises entrepreneurs, professionals and achievers from different walks of life. "To become the Voice of Young Indians Globally" being the vision of Yi, it provides a platform for young Indians to participate in and contribute by becoming an integral part of the Indian growth story. Yi's work is divided primarily into three groups; "Youth Leadership", "Nation Building” and “International Engagements”.

Under youth leadership, Yi works effectively for promoting leadership skills for its members through the learning programs and missions to companies of global excellence in India and abroad; the development and engagement of students through its 109 Chaupal platforms that has 10500 students; Yi's regional and national summits on themes related to times and role of youth and its engagement with the governments at the state and national level gives an opportunity for the members to become effective leaders with a vision into the future. Yi recently hosted Jeff Hoffman, serial entrepreneur from the United States across the country and hosted his renowned ‘Entrepreneur Bootcamps’ for its camps.

Under Nation Building, Yi engages its members under the board categories of education, environment, healthcare, employability, arts (sports & culture) and rural initiatives contributing positively to its surrounding eco system and the nation. Through its initiatives like Akshara under Education, Yi has impacted more than 15000 students across 57 centers and has successfully managed campaigns like the 'SYightboard Project', providing blackboards to schools across different cities, reaching out to 1070 schools nationally and impacting approximately 2,53,000 children. The Green I Contest done with an objective to engage school children to become socially aware and responsible citizens is one of its flagship programs, with the winner getting a grant of Rs 7.5 lakhs to implement their ideas.

Under "International Engagements", Yi is one of the proud founders of the G20 Young Entrepreneurs' Alliance which is a collective of leading entrepreneurially-minded organizations representing the G20 countries who seek to promote youth entrepreneurship as a powerful driver of economic renewal, job creation, innovation and social and is one of the founders of the Commonwealth Asia Alliance of Young Entrepreneurs (CAAYE) which is a network of young entrepreneurs from the Commonwealth Asia region and the organizations that support them. Yi has organized learning missions to many countries around the world to understand and learn from the best practices and cultures. It has also worked with the Planning Commission of India in conducting consultation workshops across its chapters for accumulating a youth perspective to be included in the 12th Five Year Plan and with the Ministry of External

Affairs, Government of India to facilitate missions of visiting delegations of young entrepreneurs to India from around the world. Yi has also hosted many incoming youth delegations from around the world in various parts of the country.

With twelve years of glorious past and decades ahead that promise nothing short, Yi intends to become a larger movement of young people and promote the attitude of "We Can, We Will".

Young Indians (Yi)  Mobile App was built on ShowTime - Event Management App platform. More info at http://www.angleritech.com and http://www.mobileappoutsourcing.com
